summary: You are a young student in a Japanese high school. You've murdered someone, and now you've got to cover it up. How will you manage to get out of this situation?

name: Pesterquest
summary: Embark on a quest of epic importance in Pesterquest, a grimsical episodic visual novel adventure set in the darkly funny Homestuck / Hiveswap universe. Find all the answers you're looking for as you zap between Earth and Alternia making friends as you go.

name: Persephone
summary: What if death isn't the end, but the key to solve puzzles? Where, when and how will you choose to die in order to progress? Transport yourself to this magical world enriched with beautiful graphics and captivating music.

name: Penguins vs. Bugs
summary: When a penguin entomologist's specimens are set loose, a team of penguins works to recover the escaped bugs as quickly as possible. Our penguin hero sets out to immobilize the insects so that the rest of the team can capture them.

name: Pelican and Medjed
summary: Go to the exciting 8-bit-Exotic worlds! To reach to the goal,break blocks and take bananas! Try speedrun, and get the best rank! Enjoy the Action puzzle from 16 stages, and more SPECIAL stage! Can you reach Final boss?

name: Pelmesh
summary: Pelmesh is a fun physical arcade game about Pelmeshka, which is trying to get out of the Cat.

name: People Playground
summary: Shoot, stab, burn, poison, tear, vaporise, or crush ragdolls in a large open space.

name: Pet Shop Snacks
summary: Welcome to Pet Shop Snacks! Upgrade your bar, beautify it and stock up on the very best ingredients. Let your restaurant be the talk of the town! Learn crazy recipes from the famous dog star chef! Deliver orders on time, but be careful not to mix them up! To work!

name: Peaceful Days
summary: Peaceful Days is a farming RPG heavily inspired by Harvest Moon series. In this game, you can build your dream from scratch, raise animals, interact with town folks, take part in interesting festivals, discover many secrets and more!

name: Pentagonal Saloon Two
summary: Pentagonal Saloon Two is a puzzle-adventure game with full of parties. Solve the unique puzzles! Join the parties and find your equipment! Collect your ticket for the big party!

name: Peasant's Quest
summary:
"Control a short-panted 'peasant' named Rather Dashing as he stumbles through Peasantry in his 'quest' to get revenge on a dragon thing." — Videlectrix

A real long time ago, in the peasant kingdom of Peasantry, some people lived... in fear. You are Rather Dashing, a peasant wearing short pants, who returns from vacation to find his thatched-roof cottage BURNINATED! You swear revenge and embark on an incredible journey to vanquish Trogdor the Burninator once and for all.

Can one Peasant wearing short pants save the countryside from certain Burnination? YOU decide!!!

name: Perpetuum Mobile
summary: In Perpetuum Mobile you take control of the perpetuum flyer where you must reach the highest score ,in infinite procedurally generated levels.

name: Pequod
summary:
A procedurally generated action game about a whale named Mobias trying to survive the onslaught of an obsessive captain named Ahab. Obtain items and add ons that make your whale more powerful. Fight through the waves of enemy ships, subs and airships until you are able to face Ahab's ship the Pequod. 
 
Features 
 
-5 different races with over 100 Enemies and Bosses 
-Lots of different items and weapons 
-A RPG stat system that includes Damage, Magic Damage, Luck, Speed and Madness 
-Shops, traps, sacrifice alters and more

name: Peer Gynt the Game
summary: Norwegian dramatist Henrik Ibsen's undying play Peer Gynt has been recreated as an interactive game for children. The game takes you through the adventures of Norwegian peasant and anti-hero Peer. A new way to experience Ibsen's tale is here.

name: Periodic Deliveries
summary: As the director of your own space shipping company, design and optimize a galactic trade network to efficiently move goods to where they're needed. Start from nothing and expand your profits and technology until your influence reaches across the galaxy.

name: PerfectLover
summary: In PerfectLover, there are three girls for players to choose from. They have different personalities and wait for the players to unlock everything about them. If they do not take safety measures, they will be pregnant.

name: Peace Data
summary: Peace Data — hard "Roguelike" game, in which you have to play for Bitard, saving Rusland from the tyranny of the authorities that destroyed the opposition and led the country to ruin, making slaves of citizens.

name: Pets Sniper Shooting
summary: Funny Pet Characters in Dead Serious Shooting and Survival game that makes this game very very unique.

name: Pentasma
summary: Pentasma is a side-scrolling arcade shooter inspired by Williams Electronics' 1981 classic 'Defender'. Protect The terraforming Humanoids from the deadly Aliens and raid the Alien planets to keep the galaxy peaceful!

name: Percy Penguin
summary:
Percy Penguin is a game similar to Pengo. It features two levels of difficulty (normal and fast), each with 3 lives at the beginning. You command a little penguin on a board who has to win against enemies in the form of green balls. 
 
The penguin can push iceblock away to arrange the board or to crush monsters. There are two ways for wining a level: crushing every monster on the current board or collecting the three diamonds. At the end of a level, the time elapsed is used for score calculation. The penguin can be moved in four directions with a joystick or the keypads and the fire button is used to push the blocks.

name: Personal Trip to the Moon
summary:
a video game about dysphoria and astronauts 
 
"Personal Trip to the Moon" is an experimental game about exploration and discovery which serves as a psychogram of a gray wasteland and its inhabitant. It's a game about finding yourself 384400 kilometers away from home.

name: Perfect Harmony
summary: A 4-Player retro NES Mega Man inspired game!

name: Penguin Park 3D
summary: Take care of a bunch of penguins! Feed them fish, clean their poo, and give them party hats! Make them do tricks to earn money, and buy eggs to get more penguins. Make sure they don't die or your park will be closed! Can you breed 10 penguins before you're laid off?

name: Peasant Uprise
summary: Peasant Uprise sets a group of peasants on a deadly quest against the new lord that has taken over their province. Unskilled in the arts of war, they will use their only known skills and tools to regain control of the Province of Swayne.

name: Peppered
summary:
Face off in a series of snowball fights! Wreck the entire neighborhood.

You command a group of friends in snowball fights against kids around the neighborhood. Make them scoop up snow, let them throw snowball at opponents and build snow walls to defend yourself.

name: Pew Pew Planet
summary:
Calling all brave space captains! Fire up your Guardian cannons and blast away those pesky Minions! 
 
Use your deadly accuracy to shoot the Minions circling around the planet! Be careful not to hit the planet and bombs! The higher your level, the more Minions to eliminate! Get a high score to receive more Allstars!

name: Pear Quest
summary: A tiny adventure game set on a huge island. Talk to animals, solve puzzles and reach the big pear at the top...

name: Peg Solitaire Adventure
summary: This game is an implementation of the board game Peg Solitaire. The objective is, making valid moves, to empty the entire board except for a solitary peg in the central hole. Seven types of game layouts.

name: Pendula Swing: The Complete Journey
summary: Explore a memorable 1920s fantasy world where you interact, befriend and romance hundreds of characters with unique quests, as an already rich and famous heroine.

name: PewDiePie's Pixelings
summary:
Pixelings is a quirky creature-collecting game set in PewDiePie’s Pixelverse.

Trouble has been brewing across Pixeland, home of the cute & quirky Pixelings; a mysterious being has been consuming Pixeland’s inhabitants. It’s up to you and PewDiePie to defeat the threatening invaders and restore order to Pixeland’s different worlds!

• Collect & upgrade cute and quirky Pixelings
• Join PewDiePie on a memorable & quest across Pixeland
• Compete against other players in real-time PvP matches
• Experience a unique, fluid combat system
• Enjoy a meme-tastic storyline set in PewDiePie’s Pixelverse (Tuber Simulator, Legend of the Brofist)
• Join guilds and chat with your friends!

name: PeakPoise
summary: PeakPoise is a VR simulator, where the player can practice playing instruments in different scenes. You should have an operator who can trigger different events.

name: Perpetual Dream
summary: Perpetual Dream is a FPV puzzle game telling the story of a dream hiding a lot of secrets... Discover several environments to seek your past !

name: Penguin Cafe
summary: PENGUIN CAFE is a short visual novel about that weird in-between time where you're not sure whether your date is going to show up or not... and then that awkward time afterwards when you're sure your date isn't going to show up but you've already ordered a coffee so you just stare at your phone a lot and keep checking your messages.

name: Peekaboo Collection - 3 Tales of Horror
summary: Three horror games. Three different stories exerting you into dark twist, forcing you confront face to face with the creatures that lurk there.

name: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind
summary: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

name: Pendragon
summary:
Pendragon is a turn-based strategy game, where every move you make drives the narrative, and every story twist opens new gameplay opportunities.

Will you advance and show your mettle, or cautiously retreat? Will you slip round enemies, or encounter them head-on? And when sacrifices are required, who will you put in harm's way?

name: Personal Space
summary: Escape the clutches of friendship and social expectations in this top-down puzzler about living with social anxiety.

name: Penny Racers
summary:
Penny Racers (released as Choro Q in Japan) is a 1996 racing video game developed by Tamsoft and published by Takara for the PlayStation. Sony Computer Entertainment released the game in PAL regions. The game features cars based on Takara's line of miniature Choro Q / Penny Racers toys, and was the first game based on Choro Q released outside Japan since Taito's 1984 title on MSX.

Screech along tarmac raceways, slide around icy corners in the winter sections, or skid around dirt tracks in the rally courses. Squished up versions of real-life cars plus a split screen mode for frantic two player road duels.

name: Peglin
summary: Peglin is a Pachinko Roguelike - Fight enemies by collecting special orbs and popping pegs to deal damage. Acquire special relics that radically change the game and ensure no two runs are the same. Aim carefully to survive in this unique turn-based RPG!

name: Petals of Doom
summary: Horizontal shooter

name: Perfect World Mobile
summary: Perfect World has made its grand return! This new installment restores the beautiful scenery and rich class choices that made the original game famous.

name: Persona 5 Royal: Phantom Thieves Edition
summary: The Phantom Thieves Edition includes a Joker mask with stand, a limited edition Steelbook case, the game soundtrack, an artbook, a dynamic PS4 theme download and a Collector's box.

name: Persona 5 Royal: Launch Edition
summary: The Launch Edition includes the game in a limited edition Steelbook case and a dynamic PS4 theme download.

name: Persona 5 Royal: Straight Flush Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Persona 5: The Royal,
Special box with Shigenori Soejima-illustrated artwork,
Persona 5 Royal art book (B5-size, hard cover, 48 pages),
Persona 5 Royal soundtrack (one CD + booklet),
Designed by P-Studio t-shirt (size: large),
Velvet Room Costume & BGM Special Set,
Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight Costume & BGM Set

name: Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers - Otakara BOX
summary: This edition includes the following: Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers, New Illustrated Special Box, Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers art book (48 pages), Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers original soundtrack (45 tracks), Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers Making-Of Blu-ray Theme Song “You Are Stronger”, Morgana towel (350mm x 900mm), Persona Team original design sacoche

name: Persian Nights 2: The Moonlight Veil
summary: Travel to the magical land of Persian Nights and save your sister from a dire fate. Feel the taste of orient in this sumptuous and beguiling hidden object adventure.

name: Persona 4: Racing All Afternoon
summary: Persona 4: Racing All Afternoon is a fan-made kart racer featuring characters from Persona 3 and 4.

name: Peck N Run
summary:
Peck N Run is the cutest arcade action game ever made about regurgitating crustaceans!

Peck N Run is the only game ever made about the eternal salty struggle between Sea and Sand Piper!

Your chicks are hungry - and only you can feed them fast enough!

name: Petty Puny Planet
summary: Why have a pet rock when you can have a pet planet? Micromanage this cosmic rock to places never thought possible!

name: Peepaw
summary: Oh no! Peepaw was messing around with the Ouija board and got possessed again! Help find Meemaw and escape! That's right, your good ol' grandpa has been possessed by demonic forces and is now attempting to murder you and your family! Traverse a dark house, find your cousins for upgrades, and rescue Meemaw before you're all dragged to Hell! This version features new Peepaw behaviors.

name: Peace of Mind
summary:
You just recently closed on your dream home. It’s perfect! Well, almost…

You quickly find out there's a ghost inhabiting your new abode, and they aren’t too happy with your arrival.
However, there is hope! It seems when you bring certain mementos to them, they become docile, and begin to fade. Items that carry bad memories agitate them more, causing them to lash out at you!
In order to save your home, you must restore the memories of the former resident, and help them find peace. Fail to bring the correct items in time, and the ghosts will make your stay a little more…eternal.

name: Penguin Piste
summary:
Get your penguin to the bottom of the mountain, avoiding obstacles and collect as many coins as you can to buy all the unlockable extras! 
 
A fast skiing action platformer with genuinely challenging levels. 
 
- Simple controls 
- Avoid every obstacle 
- Collect as many coins as you can 
- Earn all the unlockable extras 
 
Ski, board and snowbike your way down the mountain 
 
Test your skills and timing to reach the high score on every level 
 
All extra content is fully unlockable by completing levels and collecting in game coins! Or coins can be purchased using in-app purchases 
 
https://captainisolation.games/penguin-piste/

name: Penance
summary: Destroy sin, earn your Peace. Oldschool FPS with procedural levels and a campaign mode

name: Perfect Park
summary: Race against strangers and friends, only the top rocket drifter has the chance to perform a Perfect Park!

name: Peach's Christmas Invitation
summary:
Peach's Christmas Invitation is a mini-hack made by Kaze Emanuar, released for Christmas 2013.

It only has one full level, with one side level and two stages which lead to a final boss. Though short, this hack contains lots of custom enemies, unique levels, custom stuff and interesting missions.

name: Penguin's Dogma
summary:
A simple horror-style stealth game, where you can have fun playing tag with penguins.
If you get caught three times, you lose.
If you burn all of the penguins to a crisp, you win.

name: Perisher
summary: A mod of the PICO-8 platformer Celeste (now known as Celeste Classic) with new levels and sliding block mechanics.

name: Perfectly Perilous Provisions
summary:
Think Human: Fall Flat wobbles into Overcooked and serves up a side of Takeshi's Castle in a Victorian town beset by eldritch beings!

Perfectly Perilous Provisions is a co-op active rag doll culinary adventure. Flop and flail your way through bizarre dishes and devices to serve up to all manner of customer!

Take part in frantic mini-games and obstacle courses to unlock new ingredients and character customisations.

name: Peckin' Pixels
summary: Peckin' Pixels is a cute management game where you run a chicken farm and make money selling your chicken's colourful eggs.

name: Persona Q2: New Cinema Labyrinth - Showtime Premium Edition
summary:
It's showtime! The ultimate persona experience awaits. Reunite with the iconic characters from Persona 3, Persona 4, and Persona 5 when they are all thrown into a new and mysterious world together.
Showtime Premium Edition includes: 5” Koromaru plush toy, Art book, Four buttons (one for each protagonist), Playing cards featuring characters from each game.

name: Persona 3 Em
summary: Persona 3 Em is an RPG for mobile phones designed as a side-story taking place during the Yakushima trip of Persona 3. It is designed to emulate the original game in having a social-interaction driven daytime period and a dungeon-crawling night period.

name: Persona 5: 20th Anniversary Edition
summary: The bundle includes the Persona 5 game, the 20th Anniversary soundtrack which has 5 Discs with well over 100+ songs total, an art book, and a collector's envelope in the theme of an invitation to the Velvet Room.

name: Pekoe
summary: Blend tea and friendship in the flavorful world of Pekoe, a cozy cat-filled tea-making simulator about taking the time for self-care and connecting with what makes you happy. Build relationships, upgrade your teahouse, and discover new recipes as you work towards creating a place you can call home.

name: Pearl Harbor: Strike at Dawn
summary: Pearl Harbor: Strike at Dawn is a arcade flying game. Fly one of nine American aircraft in various theaters of war in the Pacific, including Pearl Harbor.

name: Persona 2 Tsumi: Lost Memories
summary: Persona 2 Tsumi: Lost Memories (ペルソナ2 罪 LOST MEMORIES) is an RPG developed by Atlus for mobile phones.

name: Pendelum
summary: Pendelum is a physics-based puzzle platformer with a pendulum that requires patience, skill and creativity.Use only gravity and external influences to reach the goal, create your own puzzles, compare your performance with others and above all - DON'T RAGE!

name: Petal Crash
summary: Crash blocks together in a floral fantasy world and make your wish come true! Easy to learn and rewarding to master, Petal Crash is a brand new puzzle game in the tradition of the arcade action puzzlers of the mid-90s. Like the games that inspired it, Petal Crash features a variety of single player challenges in addition to an intense head-to-head versus mode.

name: Perfect Matter
summary: Amass independently powerful upgrades that synergize into world shaking phenomena, and use them to lay waste to countless entities across a dying universe.

name: Penumbra
summary: Penumbra is a tech demo made by Frictional Games to show off the power of the HPL engine, released on July 4, 2006 for free.

name: Penko Park
summary: Penko Park is a game about exploring an abandoned wildlife park. Meet its mysterious inhabitants by taking photos and interacting with the world!.

name: Perilous Warp
summary: Perilous Warp is a fast-paced indie retro-shooter inspired by the classic 3D-actions. Communication with a distant space colony has been lost, and you bravely step into the teleporter with the desire for glorious adventures. But do not expect to win in a heartbeat!

name: Peter Paper
summary: Peter Paper is an indie horror game developed by Azure Ravens Entertainment.

name: Period. The Game
summary: cute little adventure sharing the journey of menstruation

name: PewPew 2
summary: PewPew 2 is the sequel to the acclaimed PewPew. PewPew 2 is the best multidirectional shoot them up on mobile. It's basically megatons of enemies and many different game modes, everything rolled up with sweet smooth retro graphics.

name: Peachleaf Pirates
summary: Washed ashore with no memory of how you got there, an eccentric cast of locals welcome you to their quirky paradise. Divide your time between adventuring and homesteading, and discover there’s more to the island than palm trees and parrots in this colorful RPG with point & click & farm-sim elements.

name: Pecaminosa
summary:
Pecaminosa is a Police Action RPG, based on a Film Noir concept with a Pixel Art aesthetic. As John Souza – a former detective succumbed to the pleasures of alcohol and flesh – you will explore the city and its environs, as well as chase and fight ordinary thieves, smart criminals, and even some forces of… the occult.

Pecaminosa is a dark and gambling city that smells of death, sex, and gunpowder. And you know what? Once you are there, you’ll get the opportunity to experience this fictional open-ended city, all the while living through an humorous, provocative and rich story.

name: Perfect Vermin
summary: Your task is simple, exterminate all vermin. The sledge hammer you have been provided is capable of destroying almost all office appliances and furniture that may be uncooperative. Your time is running out.

name: Peoplemon
summary:
Awaken in the world of PEOPLEMON, where everybody wants to catch PEOPLE and make them fight! 
 
Professor Woke takes you under her wing you as you discover the exciting future of the economy. Catch wild PEOPLE, challenge fellow PEOPLE catchers, and face off against the chief executive of Ditfy, Inc.—and president-elect of the PEOPLE! 
 
By the end of this blackly comedic adventure, your destiny will be clear as day. And what more could a PERSON want? 
 
A short, grim, yet affectionate parody of a global sensation from the creator's childhood. Join him for chuckles in a time-warp to some version of 1998. And if you never played the original in monochrome, then keep reading.

name: Perfect Traffic Simulator
summary: Imagine the world without drivers. It can't end well... unless you will control them before they start their journey! Take control of each car on the streets and strategize your moves so cars driving on full speed smoothly pass by each other without waiting any second in the traffic! Each scenario will require different approach so please, be careful- with great power comes great responsibility.

name: Perfect Dark
summary: In the near future, Earth will be struck by a series of global disasters, bringing ecosystems around the world to the verge of collapse. Become Joanna Dark, dataDyne’s elite agent as she hunts down the world's most wanted criminal, Daniel Carrington to uncover the mysteries behind the technological breakthroughs that could threaten the lives of millions.

name: Petris
summary:
Build your favorite pets in all shapes and sizes, keep ahead of dropping pieces and make it to the next level. 
 
The game features several game play types to choose from: 
Long Pet - Complete progressively longer pets to reach the next level 
Tails Cleanup - Clear all tails off the screen per level 
Crunch-up - Keep ahead as the screen crunches upward and new pets appear 
Level Up - Classic level-up style 
Marathon - For the long distance player

name: Petal to the Metal
summary:
Mushrooms with guns. Do I have your attention? Good. 
 
Petal to the Metal is a bullet hell shoot'em up game. You play as a Flower, killing Mushrooms with your gun that upgrades the more you kill. Progress through the level to reach and destroy the final boss.

name: Peripeteia
summary: Peripeteia is a first-person game mixing shooter, stealth and RPG mechanics, placing it within the elusive and ephemeral "immersive sim" genre, heavily inspired by the greats such as Deus Ex, it expands upon the formula with original ideas and an unexplored alternative history post-soviet setting.

name: Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers - Limited Edition
Pear Potion
summary: A cute little metroidvania with challenging combat and witchcraft.

name: P.E. Noire
summary: P.E. Noire is a point-and-click adventure game set in Sunnyside Elementary School. You're a Hall Monitor! Help your fellow students and get the riff-raff in line, because the halls of this school are crawling with shady characters.

name: Peryton University
summary:
In Peryton University you play as Phim, a socially anxious and struggling to fit in freshman at Peryton University, and the dorm you are living in is hosting a house party in which you don’t know anyone. 
 
In Peryton University, Phim must take small steps towards tackling his social anxiety by interacting with people and collecting social cards to play when talking to other party goers. The goal is to collect all social cards and have the confidence to approach an estranged friend who is also attending the party.

name: Pet Cats, Save the World
summary:
A simple text-based simulator in which you pet cats and, as a result, make the world a better place. 
 
Three endings 
More than 100 randomly generated cats and effects 
Sparkles!

name: Peeb Adventures
summary:
Peeb goes on a comedic adventure to escape the back-code of his game after being banished by a mysterious entity... Will he succeed?

Swing around in this retro-styled third-person platformer as the titular Peeb, solving puzzles and navigating obstacles with your trusty grappling hook...

name: Penny Arcade Adventures: On the Rain-Slick
summary: Penny Arcade Adventures: On the Rain-Slick Precipice of Darkness is an episodic action-adventure role-playing video game series based on the webcomic Penny Arcade. It is written by Jerry Holkins and Mike Krahulik, with Mike drawing the concept art. It is published by Hothead Games.

name: Pen Pals
summary: Penpals is a game about finding your mom, accompanied by your abusive friend called Pal. Roaming the towns called Onion Town, and Understanding. There are some ghosts.

name: Pekin Express - La Route de l'Himalaya
Perish
summary: Perish is a stylish 1-4 player FPS with a cross to bear. Slay hordes of creatures on the black sands of Purgatory and sell their gold-stained corpses to craven priests. Kill magnificent bosses and use the proceeds to gain entrance to Elysium, a place of cosmic revelations.

name: Permanence
summary:
Things will stay the way you remember them
Keep things out of your line of sight to leave them the way they were
Objects with solid outlines are in your line of sight, objects with dashed outlines are not
You can move forwards and backwards or rotate

name: Perfect Gold: The Alchemy of Happiness
summary: Perfect Gold: The Alchemy of Happiness is a short, coming-of-age yuri visual novel about two former friends who escape detention in order to celebrate the Sunflower Festival. Set in the magical city of Castlecoast, readers get to know Audrey Clary, an alchemy student and heiress who secretly dreams of a different life, and Marion LaRue, a rebellious elemental magic student in search of someone she once loved.

name: Pecaminosa: Collector's Edition
summary:
Pecaminosa Collector's Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Soundtrack
- Notebook
- Poker Chips

name: Penguin Push
summary: In Penguin Push you play as a Penguines who have to escape the Eskimos and their pets squashing them by pushing blocks or red gems.

name: Penguins!
summary: Visit the most adorable animals in the zoo any time of the day or night! Join Ace the penguin on his escape through 80+ levels of penguin-puzzle fun. Ace and fellow penguin friends need your help to elude zoo keepers by using a bunch of cool gadgets to make it through 8 different zoo zones. Visit the gift shop to buy your penguins new outfits or pick up a hot new soundtrack and thaw that frigid air. Track your progress with zoo maps and play on into any season of the year. You can even download penguin soundtracks, wallpaper, and gorgeous story art. Penguins is year-round fun for everyone!

name: Pen and Paper Games Bundle
summary: Enjoy hours and hours of adventures in these turn-based, retro style, pixel-art RPG full of danger, intrigue, and semi-appropriate cultural references! All games include all of their ever-released expansions with many new characters, enemies, quests and locations!

name: Perspective
summary: A unique 3D puzzle game where two players are stuck in a maze and have different perspectives on the obstacles ahead. Players 1s maze is different from players 2s.

name: Peace Island
summary: On a remote island community, nine cats wake up to find their humans gone. Ultimately, it is up to them to decide: "Are the humans worth bringing back?"

name: Personal Rocket
summary: A point-and-click adventure about paranoia and loneliness, the evils of capitalism and too much web surfing, the material world and the occult universe. Your typical postmodern blues.

name: Peg Adventure - Solo Noble
summary: Welcome to an adventure through the Peg Adventure dungeon! Solve the puzzles to unlock valuable and unusual relics from the ancient tombs. Inspired by the game Peg Solitaire (Solo Noble), it offers new possibilities for creative and challenging solutions.

name: Perseverance
summary: Perseverance is a puzzle game. Solve the levels by sliding the cubes along the way for the Austronaut cat to pass in search of life on the red planet.

name: Penny RPG: Shadows of the Lost - A Blood City Tale
summary: After waking up in a strange unfamiliar hospital bed after a two year coma, John Smith decides to salvage what's left of his life and live a quiet and peaceful existence. Journey through Chicago with John Smith in this classic noir 2D RPG/ adventure game thriller.

name: Pets VR
summary:
Some charming pets are waiting for you to play with them - come and see what they’re up to in Pets VR!
There is a lot to do in Pets Resort, some of your duties will include: Petting cute doggo, playing with adorable Cat, making sure that they both have something to snack on and are well-rested, walking without a care in the world through the beautiful park, playing one of the multiple mini-games in which you can win special points!
Ready for some challenges? Time for some training! Learn special gestures and instruct your pet to perform different tricks - if you’re consistent it gets easier in time but be aware the pet can also forget some lessons! Reward yourself and your pupil and make it fancy! Exchange points to create your own collection of fun accessories for you and your pet to enjoy. Discover everything Pets VR can offer and most importantly, have fun!

name: Penelope
summary: Navigate and manipulate your dreams in this challenging puzzle. Rescue all of Penelope's stuffed animal friends before you run out of warm milk. Can you outwit the dastardly Emily Watterson and get back the toy she stole from you?

name: Petra and the Thylacine
summary: Set in Launceston Tasmania's beautiful Cataract Gorge the player will adventure to find grandma's house.

name: Perennial Order
summary: Perennial Order is an atmospheric One-Hit-Death Boss Rush, set in a verdant Dark Age world. Explore a lore-filled and eldritch land alone or with a friend. Slay nature-infested horrors, creatures, and titans, all in a painterly 2D style.

name: Petal Crash Online
summary: It's time to take your Petal Crashing skills to the global stage! Puzzle battle friends all around the globe with Petal Crash Online! Petal Crash Online features all the multiplayer game modes of Petal Crash, including Tug-of-war, Trash Attack, Clear Contest, 2P Co-Op, and your own custom rulesets.

name: Performer
summary: Performer is a game with fun puzzles. Test your logic and ingenuity in different locations of the world as a mercenary who has to eliminate goals or steal secret developments.

name: Penguin Climbing
summary: Control the penguin and try to climb to the top of the snow-capped mountains

name: Pebble Witch
summary: Play as a witch. Talk to pebbles. Reflect on the melancholy of becoming. Sit more. Walk. More walking. Have a crush on your burly teacher. Enjoy a lovely day in an Australian beach town.

name: Pettan Pyuu
summary: "Pettan Pyuu" is an action game released by SUNSOFT in 1984. Take control of the character, "Pettan" and make use of the plates to wipe out bugs and solve the interdimensional maze. You will need to master 4 different types of plates, all with their own characteristics.

name: Pendle Hill
summary: Pendle Hill is a unique and intense single player open-world survival horror game. The game is loosely based on a real life location with a dark past. Immerse yourself in an amazingly detailed world and find out who you really are and what you are made of!

name: Peppy's Adventure
summary: Peppy’s Adventure is a 1-screen, top-down, action-puzzle game controlled with directional inputs only. You control Peppy, a bun-shaped bunny, on his journey to rescue the village younglings from the clutches of the Hooded Fox. As you pursue his airship, you will have to solve your way through short challenging levels as fast as possible facing an army of reckless foxes.

name: Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love
summary: “Peachleaf Valley: Seeds Of Love” is a romance visual novel/otome game whose premise is inspired by farming-sim genre classics. Dive into a world filled with beauty, nature, and love as you become the newest resident of a lush valley where the sea, the sky, and the land all seem to meet...

name: Pemsa
summary: Pemsa is a cart runner for the famous PICO-8 fantasy console. We've included the classic games developed for this console, including Celeste, Slipways & Hug Arena.

name: Peaceful Gunner
summary: Peace, love, and... GUNS! Peaceful Gunner is a shooter-defense game about good vibes. Shoot some magical flowers to turn soldiers into hippies and make the world a better place (or not).

name: Pets No More
summary: Pets no more is a fun and dynamic sports game featuring crazy zombie pets in a tournament to rule Pet Island!

name: Peggo!
summary: PEGGO! is an incremental pachinko-styled game with realistic physics. Drop tokens into the board to earn money, buy upgrades that earn you even more money, and repeat.

name: PewPew
summary: PewPew is a fun 2d platformer shooter game currently in development where you complete levels fight bosses and shoot up enemies with all different types of weapons.

name: PetDrivr
summary: Drive with your pet over the town, collecting pet snacks, and their favorite toys before reaching your destination. Get help from your friends to find the exact location of the toy in the cooperative mode, or challenge them to find out who can collect more snacks!

name: PePiBo: Peregrino Pinata Bowling
summary: The ancient evil Lava Dragon has awakened the Volcano of Maconda! It is time for you, young Peregrino, to save the island by challenging the Dragon to... a Piñata Bowling duel! Use your bowling skills and ingenuity to clear surprising piñata bowling puzzles!

name: Petrol Blood
summary: "The authentic taste of the Eastern Bloc gasoline" Petrol Blood is a stealth/chase driving game set in the Eastern Europe during the Cold War era. Play the story of two expert drivers, who will try to outrun the apocalypse on wheels!

name: Peasants
summary: A city builder with a twist - Putting the focus of the game on the peasants who live and grow in your community. Cater for them, deal with their shortcomings and just maybe they will thrive.

name: Personality Dating Sim
summary: A dating simulator based on personality rather than gender or appearance.

name: Perfect Heist 2
summary: Perfect Heist 2 is a round-based online game, where robbers try to hide in plain sight while robbing a bank without being noticed by the cop team!

name: Pentaquin: Deeds of Twilight
summary: Pentaquin: Deeds Of Twilight is a hand-drawn 2D-Platformer Game, combining beautiful art and music with a deep, dark story all about re-uniting your broken family in a world shattered by war.

name: Peace, Death! 2
summary: Peace, Death! 2 is a midcore turn-based logic game where you send clients to Hell, Heaven, or Purgatory and help members of the Reapers Union as they work towards their great cause!

name: Pejes vs. Zombies
summary: Resist the attack of the Peje Zombies! survive on this multiplayer or single player wave shooter! a Mexican fiesta!

name: Petz 4
summary: Petz consists of Dogz 4 and Catz 4. Dogz and Catz are virtual petz that live on your computer. Players can adopt, raise, care for and breed their own Catz and Dogz. This title introduced companion Bunnies and Pigs, as well as travel playscenes.

name: Pedro's Adventures in Spanish
summary:
'Pedro's Adventures in Spanish' is a language learning adventure game. All of the dialogue, narration and interface is in simple Spanish accompanied by graphics, animation and context so that you can learn without the need for translations.

This is not a classroom, there are no quizzes or word matching exercises. The purpose of this game is to provide a fun environment for you to practice and learn through context and immersion.

-Classic Point & Click 2D Pixel Art game
-Dozens of unique characters fully voice acted by native Spanish speakers
-Auto-saved progress and no death mechanic encourages experimentation without risk
-Over 1800 lines of in-game Spanish dialogue
-Approximately 15-20 hours of game play (depending on experience level)

name: PewDuckPie: On the Run
summary: A PewDiePie's fan game

name: Peco
summary: An action-puzzle game that guides the player to the goal by considering where the stage is projected with the camera.(Google Translation)

name: Pet Knight into cave
summary: In this world, you have to play as a pet rider. You will go to the crypt, defeat monsters to get gold coins, and upgrade yourself to explore deeper caves.

name: Penny's Path
summary: In this voice-acted, hand-painted visual novel about women and witchcraft, a brush with the coronavirus sends Penny back in time to the New England witch hunts. As Penny meets strong female characters who challenge past and present stereotypes, she discovers her own special role in the changing seasons of time.

name: Penguin Panic
summary: A colourful, whacky and fun game. Move the Penguins into groups of 2 or more. The buttons provided will help you. Earn bonus points for completing a level.

name: Peblito: Rock and Roll
summary: Dash, Burst, Swing and Roll your way through this 3D platforming adventure, inspired by the games of the Crash Bandicoot era.

name: Pee War!
summary: Play pee Superman and destroy the city and the forest! Destroy everything in your sight and avoid the human army attack!

name: Pearls of the Oceans
summary: Together for the Planet! Evade and outsmart the many dangers of the oceans, collect the Pearls to save the World. Stay on your toes through 100 handcrafted levels and challenge yourself to climb the leaderboard and prevent the war to begin.

name: Pet Society
summary: Create your own pet buddy! Design your pets by choosing genders, names, colors and altering appearances. Interact with your pets through washing, brushing, petting and feeding. Send your pets to visit the pets of your friends and have fun eating, playing or doing sports. Welcome to the world of Pet Society.

name: Penguin Isle
summary:
Raise your Penguin Isle. Collect a variety of penguins by creating each their own habitat.
Cute and adorable penguins are waiting for you.

name: Peter's Day Out
summary: Peter's Day Out is a short narrative game about a cat searching for the perfect birthday present for his human. Explore the little beach town and help the citizens in this fun, lighthearted adventure.

name: PetRPG
summary: PetRPG is a virtual pet site that was created in November 2009. Their goal was to create a fun, unique, community-based game that people of all ages can enjoy, with many exciting and interesting pets, worlds and items that you won't find on ordinary pet sites.

name: Penimorta
summary: You are a Wizard. Being imprisoned in Penimorta, a maximum security prison, has little appeal. Naturally, you've decided to bust out. The problem is... between every floor of Penimorta is a Corporeal Beast. Can you escape?

name: Penguin Quest
summary: Penguin quest - A bright platformer about a little penguin who went on a journey. Collect apples and coins on a variety of snow-covered levels, avoid deep chasms and sharp thorns, and beware of treacherous snowmen that will prevent you from going to victory!

name: Peopledown
summary: Are you looking for a cruel slaughter game? "PEOPLEDOWN" is an action game where you become a cruel murderer and kill people. This game is for people who like villainous slaughter games.

name: Perfect Affection Plan: Cassiopeia
summary: Kaede Uzuki, Everyone loves her, but finds loneliness as an adult to be unbearable. You're a college student who just moved from the next city. You're starting to feel interested in her. There is attraction, and she is thirsty. What are you planning to do to fulfill her thirstiness?

name: Perfect Decision
summary: 「Perfect decision」 is a 2D strategic business simulation game with real estate as its theme. Here, you will choose different types of characters, use different types of companies, recruit different types of employees, and use different means to make profits in different types of cities!

name: Perfect Tides
summary: Perfect Tides is a point and click adventure game about the agony and anticipation of being a teen. Set in the year 2000, you play as Mara, an internet-obsessed young writer who lives on a so-called island paradise. Following 4 seasons of the year, you experience through Mara the beauty and silence of the island, the turmoil of family life and mainland public school, and an ever-evolving quest for love, friendship and experience.

name: Pesky Humans
summary: Pesky Humans is a real-time, top-down, point-and-click sci-fi shooter. It is single player, with setting-appropriate music unique to each difficulty level. Talkative Ship AIs respond to players actions, spoken in English but subtitled for other languages.

name: Peppered: An Existential Platformer
summary:
A light hearted 2D platformer about the meaningless of existence. Dark humour. Big focus on narrative-driven gameplay. Regret. Currently being developed for PC and Mac.
You play as a nameless civilian of an immortal world an hour before a return of the God of death. Life presents you with an opportunity to take this matter into your own hands. And then presents you with countless ways to fail spectacularly.

name: Perfect Crime: Collector's death
summary: Love and hate between a collector and several ghostly visitors.

name: Pegasus: Broken Wings
summary: Follow a new set of events involving Pegasus-5 crew with them being stuck in a city under curfew after a terrorist attack and getting entangled in a massive conspiracy. Stick close to your allies, build romantic relations, and make important choices.

name: Pepo
summary: Pepo is a 2D platformer shooting game that fights boss by firing three colors. Join Pepo's adventure of meeting mutant bosses on the extinct planet and leaving to find Pepo's home!

name: Pendek
summary: You are Yandi, a villager who works for the Pandang Logging Company deep in the Sumatran jungle. An accident leaves you stranded and alone in the jungle. You must survive, you must escape. But who knows what you might come across in the process?

name: Perils of Poom
summary:
You need money fast so what'd you do? Well, you end up getting a job which involves going round the galaxy in search of a rare (illegal) drug for a large cash reward, of course.

With 4 different planets to visit, a short bonus section to unlock at the end, and..er.. probably some other attributes.

name: PewPew!
summary: PewPew! - move, shoot and upgrade!

name: Peg Solitaire
summary: A relaxing, yet challenging peg jumping board game.

name: People Power: The Game of Civil Resistance
summary:
People Power is about politics, about strategy and about social change. As a leader of a popular movement you will fight against tough adversaries who control the police, the army, the bureaucracy—even the media. The only weapon in your hand is your strategic skill and ingenuity.

But People Power is more than just a game. It’s an opportunity to join a community of others who want to learn about civil resistance and nonviolent strategies. The game allows you to design and play your own custom scenarios by using a Scenario Builder. Everyone can design scenarios and post them on the People Power forum, available to the whole community, where you can exchange ideas with other players and scenario writers.

name: Peaceful Soul
summary: Peaceful Soul is a Social Life Simulation. In this game you can interact with villagers, building friendships, finding love, take part in interesting festivals.

name: Perseverance: Part 2
summary: Perseverance is a horror/crime thriller visual novel. Play as Karen, a calculated assassin, and witness the gripping story of secrets, passion, and violence.

name: Perfect Split
summary:
Control the creature can be split. Avoid the obstacles on the route. At the same time get the coin as you can.
Are you ready! Every level has a different challenge and experience.
Can you reach the last level? Come on!

name: Peachy Adventure
summary: The destroyer Sams suffered a serious breakdown during its transition to the Pador Galaxy. It came to unknown time and space and broke into a sealing circle. After struggling to rescue a sexy beauty, it was discovered that there were still people sealed. . .

name: Perang Laut: Maritime Warfare
summary: Perang Laut Maritime Warfare is a historical real time strategy based on maritime history in Indonesia archipelago. Choose one of 11 unique kingdom and the build it from small power to powerful maritime empire in entire islands with power of navies for rule the sea!

name: PetrifactionUnderRuin
summary: The biggest feature is that it produces state changes such as petrification in real time until it becomes incapacitated. Multiple types of materials can be selected for petrification. The content of the game is an avoidant STG where the ending branches depending on the action in the boss battle.

name: Penalty Shoot-Out Soccer: 2010 World Champion
summary: Are you crazy about World Cup ? Are you a soccer enthusiast ? Now you will be able to experience a different soccer!! Penalty Shoot-Out Soccer: 2010 World Champion will bring you different experience of Soccer! Choose a country you like to play against other 31 countries and you can defeat them by penalty kick. Win the World Champion for yourself or for the country you like! No more hesitation! Simple control will greatly improve your penalty kick skills! Endless fun!!!

name: Pentaction: Medieval
summary: Pentaction: Medieval is a turn-based strategy board-game about chance and skill on the battlefield. Take control of your army in combat, annihilate your foe’s troops or capture their King to win. Play the enhanced Tactical game style for the ultimate strategic experience or jump straight into the action in quick battle. Challenge your friends in hotseat multiplayer or take on the AI in solo play. Do you have what it takes to lead your Kingdom to victory?

name: Perfect Zero Puzzle
summary: Perfect Zero is the new incredible puzzle game you will love this summer. If you liked a puzzle game like 2048, you will love this. Is extremely more easy to play. Just subtract numbers in other numbers and try to make the perfect zero.

name: Perv Simulator VR
summary: Stack items, climb on a garbage bin, peak trough the window and look at someone in the shower. Collect items and stash them in your hideout. Always wanted to spy on the girl you admire? Here is your chance! Time to get your inner creep on!

name: Peur Sur Amityville
summary: The player takes on the role of the father of a family that moves into the Amityville haunted house. Little by little, the house comes to life and he has to face more and more horrible events. He is a prisoner of the house and the goal is to get out alive after 24 days.

name: Perfectly Balanced
summary: Think carefully before distributing and put the weights on the scales. Perfectly Balanced is a game that seeks to extract your intelligence to logically balance your scales.

name: Petradise
summary:
"Petradise" - a paradise for pets.
They can play here, dance here, and find lots of treat here!
Friends and family are here too, they will love it! So will you!
Come and join us now!

name: People's Chess
summary:
Summon entire armies in augmented reality!
People’s chess is the craziest and funniest chess game ever ! Summon entire armies in your living room and use military leaders with cooking pan over the head to march to victory !
Funny characters, vibrant sound effects, military cooking pans and powerful nukes at your finger tip make this smart game great again!
People’s Chess is a full AR experience: you can play with a friend on one single device or improve your chess skills by playing against the computer!
And don’t forget : new armies and leaders are regularly joining the People’s chess’ gang! So make room for the funniest AR game available !

name: Periodyx Name The Element
summary: A fun way to learn the elements of the periodic table. Based on the successful card game. All 118 elements are covered in the game with visual and written clues. Click on the letters supplied with each clue to place them in the answer grid. Score points and valuable Chemistry Units for correct answers, use these Chemistry Units for filling in blank spaces and removing letters using the hint keys.

name: Perfect New World
summary:
Perfect New World is a Boundless World MMO Action RPG, where you shall become a Soul Tamer and search for the reincarnated Prime!
Immerse yourself in this seamless world experience without loading screens as you overcome the dangerous challenges and unveil the mysteries this world has to offer!
Team up with friends and explore the secrets scattered across the world, and help its inhabitants solve their various troubles through capturing Spirit Beasts, clearing dangerous dungeons, or conquering monsters in the wilds. Or, if you prefer competing, you can choose to fight other players! Unleash your powerful skills on your opponents and enjoy great combat where every hit packs a punch!

name: Pebbles? Wenches?
summary: In this whacky game created by a small group of university students, the player delivers items to ships that pass by the dock. They are rewarded with a score system and coins. If players fail to keep up with deliveries, the other penguins will not be happy, as will be shown by the anger metre above the delivery station. Gunpowder, cannonballs, rope and barrels are all things that can be picked up by the player. These items will be shown as icons by the delivery station for the player to know what to do next. Picking up cannonballs will slow down the penguin’s movement.

name: Pencil Peril
summary: Paper Puzzle Platformer

name: People of the Moon
summary: Glide, collect and dream !

name: Perfect Day
summary: ordinary day simulator

name: Pelagium Origins
summary: Straightforward turn-based strategy

name: Peril
summary: An online multiplayer co-op escape room experience where you must use your wits, skills, and speed to escape your peril. Escape rooms include Halloween dungeon, saving Christmas, robbing a bank, escaping a zombie horde, and destroying a dungeon demon. Grab your friends and join the fun!

name: Pet Show Craze
summary: Save a small town from big business, and primp and pamper the pet population in the process, in Pet Show Craze! Transform cuddly kittens, adoring dogs, wacky monkeys, and more into "Best in Show" contenders. Give your clients the extra touch in unique mini-games and sell squeaky toys to happy pet owners. You'll go crazy for Pet Show Craze!

name: Pengu
summary: Relax on a tiny island! Go fishing and see what comes up, or maybe sit inside by the fire as the ambiance of the rain helps you fall asleep.

name: Penumbra
summary: An ever-expanding world hides behind an underground obelisk. Few know its secrets, however you're not the first.

name: Penthos
summary: Penthos is a full-length kinetic narrative experience, featuring limited voice acting and original music.

name: Perfect Teams
summary: Perfect Teams is a Rogue Like deckbuilder in which you have to assemble a team of three characters, each one with unique cards and unique powers, to explore different universes and fight the corruption caused by the fusion. What will be your Perfect Team?

name: Pet Dog
summary: Want to pet a dog? PET A DOG NOW. This twine is a great fantasy of PETTING A DOG

name: Peach vodka
summary: Reunite a hot boi with his vodka-stained shoe.

name: Pentagorat
summary: VIC-20 +32k Isometric adventure

name: Pest Quest
summary: A short 2D platformer about the journey of a spider.

name: Persona 5: Goro Akechi Dating Simulator
summary: Goro Akechi is a character from the hit popular jrpg game Persona 5 and Persona 5 Royal. In this game you could date him and do certain romantic scenarios. This game have 14 endings, some short and some long and it's decided by the options you picked. So if you are a Goro Akechi fan and have him as your husbando, you need to play this game to fulfill your Goro Akechi needs.

name: Penguins Don't Walk
summary: Jogo de Ritmo sobre pinguins.

name: Perseids, or, All This Will Go on Forever
summary: Four trans girlfriends go on a road trip to a dark sky park, to see the perseid meteor shower. A 6.5k-long story, with small branches but a single ending. There's very little conflict, drama, no-one dies. Just a good time.

name: Perfumare
summary: Story rich, dark fantasy with elements of mystery and romance.

name: Peccator-It's Not Over Yet
summary: Peccator is a Psychological Indie Horror Game, Where you play as Felix a youtuber and a haunted explorer who receives an email about a haunted cabin in the woods. As soon as he enters the woods he finds something weird about this place.

name: Perestroika
summary: Perestroika is a Russian video game. The game consists of controlling a small frog-like creature which jumps from one lily pad to another, trying to collect dots in four colors symbolizing grocery goods, currency transactions, progressive taxes and adventures and to reach a certain pad in the right-top corner of the screen. The lilies, symbolizing the ever-changing laws and acts in the USSR, constantly shrink and disappear only to appear in other places. Higher levels also feature one or more evil creatures called "bureaucrats" which follow the frog and try to eat it. The frog dies if the lily pad on which it is standing disappears, if the player moves it to a place where there is no lily pad, or if it is caught by a bureaucrat.

name: Pet Furball
summary: A cute virtual pet that you can play with in various ways.

name: Penalty Kick '91
summary: Show off your penalty skills! Penalty Kick '91 is an epic penalty shoutout for soccer lovers.

name: Pet the Duck!
summary: Will this little Duck become your friend or foe?

name: Pebble's Bakery
summary: Play a bear running a bakery.

name: People's Committee of Game Development
summary: A game-development simulation set in a socialist state.

name: Peter Padder Pauleypop
summary: A short game about being a person.

name: People Manipulation Sim
summary: An indirect-control simulator

name: Penroses
summary: A journey through two disorienting realms.

name: Peter Talisman: Lord of the Harvest
summary: An insatiable desire to dance inexplicably takes reign over a peasant farmland which Peter Talisman finds himself determined to find the source of. Harvest a seemingly endless amount of corn to clear the field to discover new characters, hidden artifacts, and steps to unravel the mystery of the dancing bug.

name: PewPew Live
summary: Fast-paced twin joystick shooter.

name: Penny Dragon
summary: A GM-less, co-operative game about little dragons.

name: Personal Space Station
summary: We must save Flurp!

name: Peripeteia: Land of Folklore
summary: A folk-inspired adventure/romance kinetic visual novel

name: Peyton's Post-Op Visits
summary: Join Peyton as he visits his old roommate Marcus after his top surgery, and learns the ways their lives have converged and diverged in the years since they last met.

name: Pearl Grabber
summary: i'm feeling like i wanna grab the pearls

name: PepperTown
summary: RPG-themed idle game

name: Peak
summary: Reach the summit of the mountain fighting off vicious monsters!

name: Periwinkle Blues
summary: A short and challenging platformer

name: Peco Peco
summary: Snap back giant 3D puzzles in VR, and cut your own 3D puzzle gifts for friends

name: Pentabrawl
summary: Party Combat Game for up to 4 Players!

name: Personal Valley
summary: Expose yourself in a micro habitat

name: PepaFatal
summary: In PepaFatal you play as Pepa the toilet paper. Trying to survive the endless panic buying from several hands trying to grab you. Dodge hands, obstacles by rolling and jumping.

name: Perfect Balance
summary: A minimalist physics simulation game about balancing weights of different shapes and sizes on a tilting platform. Simple controls let you drag and drop weights wherever you choose, and upgrades will make the balancing easier.

name: Peculiar Fables: The Werebed
summary: The Werebed is a small horror parody story about The Werebed.

name: Pesadelo: O Início
summary: Pesadelo is a brazilian horror game. You will experience Alex's nightmare, a young worker atormented by stories and urban legends about his next work place. Suspense is waiting for you! Run and pray to wake up!

name: Pengu Never Left
summary: A small game about a penguin named Pengu who lives on a tiny island. Fish and relax as the days pass by.

name: Peep the Trayton
summary: Peep the Trayton is an Indie Horror game that will knock your socks off with state of the art AI pathing. Collect 7 Movies that Trayton finds dear before he catches you.

name: Pegaxy
summary:
Pegaxy (Pegasus Galaxy) is a racing game with futuristic mythological styling. Pega (the horses) are descendants of the mighty Pegasus. In this game, players will participate in PvP format races to win rewards in the platforms native utility token, VIS (Vigorus).

Pegaxy has a very unique ecosystem that allows players to enter any race, for free. With this economic model, gameplay is very competitive, however the rewards are still lucrative. Players compete against 14 other racers in an attempt to earn a top 3 placement. All players inside the top 3 earn VIS tokens, the platforms utility token. Knowledge, strategy and skill are all required to place in the top 3. Be prepared to race, dedicate time and be one with your Pega, the rewards will make it all worthwhile.

name: Penguin Diner: Restaurant Dash
summary: Penny the Penguin goes off track during an Antarctic trek and finds herself completely lost and broke. Help Penny earn enough money to get her home to her family!

name: PentaBlox
summary:
PentaBlox is a single player, shareware implementation of the traditional puzzle Pentominoes. Pentas are shapes made from five connected squares, this means that they all have the same area but a different shape. The player’s task is to fit the shapes into a box. There are twelve shapes in total which must be fitted into a box. The shareware game has just a 6x10 box but the registered game has three other box sizes 5 x 12, 4 x 15, and 3 x 20.

Pieces may be rotated and/or flipped in order to position them in the box and there’s an optional grid setting to help with the planning.

name: Pebble
summary: 3D-Platformer where you play as Pebble who moves objects in time in search for his parents. Uncover the story by exploring new environments as you go on to find unique setpieces throughout the game.

name: Peculiar Tales of Mid-Lake Pavilion
summary: On a sultry night in late August, I ran into a man carrying a peony lantern at the Mid-Lake Pavilion. In the hazy and dim light, the man told the odd and bizarre stories. Under the overcast rainy sky, the moon setting horizontally, you will be brought into a perplexing, weird, and supernatural world

name: Pen Pal Princess
summary: Pen Pal Princess is a queer romcom visual novel about long distance relationships and online dating. Correspond with potential suitors through letter writing, email, and DMs to convince them to rescue you from your secluded princess tower!

name: Pet idle
summary: Pet Idle is a simulation game where you can take care of various virtual animals! Build and manage your home to be a cozy home for many pets!

name: Peak Darkness
summary: Survive and defend your home or don't it really doesn't matter. What matters is sending those things back to where they came from. Use weapon upgrades, friends or whatever to do this just get it done.

name: Pets at Work
summary: Some pets got lost from their owners in an office and now need to work together, using boxes, mats, buttons, climb on shelves and tables or just make a mess trying to find them in this colorful co-op game!

name: Penelope's Odyssey
summary: Penelope's Odyssey is an adventure-platfomer game where you play as Penelope, an orphaned pet rat. Use your unique sense of smell to navigate the maze of a post apocalyptic city, collect memories of your owner and eventually escape to freedom.

name: Peach's Fury
summary: Peach's Fury is a Super Mario 64 ROM hack by Kaze Emanuar inspired by the game Bowser's Fury. It consists of a small map full of small challenges that grant Power Stars that Mario has to use to pay back his debt to Peach.

name: Penguin Hunting
summary: Penguin Hunting - 2d platformer, in the role of a penguin you need to collect all the fish on the level and take them to the house. Beware of eagles and bears, each of them is a mortal danger for you. Develop a strategy and complete all levels.

name: Personal Trainer Simulator
summary: A lighthearted, humorous and educational sim in which you take on the role of both nutritionist and health guru while overseeing and guiding your clients towards accomplishing their fitness goals.

name: PenBall
summary: There is a ball on a small field with a top view. Your gate is at the bottom, and your opponent's gate is at the top. Your goal is to score the ball into the opponent's goal.

name: Pedro and Sofia's Nuclear Winter
summary: A fantasy adventure across a nuclear-torn America! Play as Pedro and Sofia and set out on a quest in this open-world, 3D/2D role-playing game!

name: PengoRoyale
summary: PengoRoyale is a fun, colorful, competitive, couch-brawling, battle royale! Be the last penguin standing as you fight for dominance on the ice. Grab the many power-ups and bring the smack down to 11 of your friends. Try it today!

name: Perfect Balance Collection
summary: Stack and balance blocks, don't let them fall off the screen. 380 levels! Can you solve all the puzzles? Contains all five classic Perfect Balance games.

name: Perfect Paths
summary: Perfect Paths is amazing puzzle solving game where you create paths and add other instructions to move blocks to their designated positions. Blocks can be combined or separated. These simple rules create interesting environment, where each puzzle can be solved in many different ways.

name: Peasant TD
summary: Peasent TD is a fantasy tower defence game with card game elements. Towers are built and upgraded through cards that are bought in the shop or crafted from the forge. This means every game will be unique, you will not be able to rely on a specific build order or strategy. Adaptation is necessary.

name: Perceptio
summary: Perceptio is a VR puzzle game set on a small floating Japanese aesthetic island, solve 10 small puzzles and fix the worlds time to complete the game.

name: Permanence TD
summary: Tower defense that will make you think

name: Pentagons Go Weee
summary: A free-to-play 2D Rhythm-based action game where you don't have to be on the beat but rather have to dodge the beats. Compete with the world with global leaderboard and be number 1 in all difficulties: Easy, Hard and Impossible!? Take a deep dive into this retro-type game with over 5 songs.

name: Pepper's Castle
summary: A JRPG made with RPG Maker MV. Play as a mercenary from a land far away hired by Lady Clipboard to destroy all humans. Or rebel agaisnt her and aid Queen Pepper and her request to defeat all the evil monsters called Titans.

name: PepeFrog
summary: Welcome to PepeFrog! Set a new world record in the crazy frog simulator to become the TOP-1 player in the world rankings!

name: Per Aspera: Green Mars
summary: It's harvest time on Mars! The biggest and richest update has come to the Red Planet! With the free Green Mars DLC, a new set of features will assist players in changing the surface of Mars forever.

name: Peek a Phone
summary: Peek a Phone is a realistic mystery adventure game where you’ll dive into an immersive story that sharpens your detective skills. Unravel the mystery, find the vital clue, solve the puzzle, and enter into realistic games!

name: Perish Song
summary: Perish Song is a 2D action rogue-lite. Traverse through different environments as you battle unique enemies and bosses. Discover the secrets of the world as you dash and blast through anything standing in your path. Each death is an opportunity to learn, adapt, and overcome.

name: Penguin Slide
summary: Penguin Slide is a fast paced, physics based, singleplayer obstacle course game with a focus on being fun.

name: Peep Invasion
summary: Forge your team from a variety of different creatures, each with their own strengths and abilities, and stop the never-ending invasion of Peeps!

name: Peril
summary: Peril is an action adventure 2d platformer created using Unreal Engine 4. In this game the main character must battle through various worlds and defeat many enemies, all the while using a javelin as both a weapon and a tool to reach new places.

name: Peridot
summary: In Peridot, players will raise magical beasts called Peridots.

name: Pengo
summary:
The handheld version of Pengo is a portable LCD game manufactured by Bandai with a license from Sega. It was released in 1982, and is based on the arcade game, Pengo.

Very little is known about the LCD version of Pengo, though it is possible that it was not released outside of Japan. It can be assumed it bears some relationship with the arcade game, but as the system is quite rare, nothing has yet been documented.

name: Pengo
summary:
The LCD version of Pengo is an handheld game developed by Handheld Ltd.. It was distributed by Hashy Top-In in 2009 as part of the Pocket Boy Series.

It is based on the arcade game, Pengo. It should not be confused with an earlier "port" by Bandai.

name: Per Aspera: Blue Mars
summary: The Blue Mars DLC introduces players to new, ocean-size bodies of water and all the benefits that come with them! You've changed the face of the Red Planet with the Green Mars update - now let's go for blue!

name: Penguin Adventure
summary: Penguin Adventure is an action adventure game, the game screen is very gorgeous, the game set up a rich game levels, players need to control the penguin forward to eat the stars and fruit, eliminate monsters, avoid obstacles, the game play is very thrilling.

name: Perfect Truck Bundle
summary: The perfect combination of two games, pure arcade gameplay in a world of Monster Trucks and a world without drivers. What would the world look like if you were in control of the streets?

name: Perseverance: Part 3
summary: Perseverance: Part 3 is the much-awaited conclusion to the drama/horror visual novel series full of intrigue, guts, and gossip. Swap between Jack, a father trying to protect his family, and Karen, an ex-agent on the run from her troubled past, and help them form an unlikely alliance.

name: PewDiePie's Paradise Island
summary:
Survive on this paradise island and wait for the chopper!

Game done in 72 hours for indies vs pewdiepie game jam.

name: Peace Maker VR
summary: Peace Maker VR is a game in a fantasy world where you defend a village with guns and magic.

name: Perfect Grind
summary: Flip, grind and more with brand new touch controls that make it easy and fun to learn new tricks! A wide variety of cool, wacky characters and apparel to choose from! Build your own one-of-a-kind creations from over 50 different prefabs, and then share them with your friends - or the world!

name: Petrified
summary: Team up with your group of hunters to track down an invisible ghost and stop it from petrifying everyone or fall victim to the ghost's wrath.

name: Pestilent Hunters
summary: Welcome to europe, home to one of the most cruel and deadly diseases to ever plague humanity, the plague, the black plague. Join the Pestilent Hunters and you'll have to face a variety of disgusting monsters to try to prevent the end of humanity in this frantic roguelike!

name: Penitence
summary: Return home and uncover the mystery of your daughter's death, and the demon that plagues you, in this escape room style atmospheric puzzler.

name: Permafrost
summary: Permafrost is a game starring Morana, a young girl who can't leave her room yet. The main objective being collecting effects in her dream world.

name: Pentomino
summary: "Pandomino" is also known as "brain racking twelve pieces". It is a hardcore spatial logic puzzle game suitable for young and old. The rules is very simple but challenging. Can you find the secret of the solution? NP->P? Find Your Way!

name: Peacemaker: Glorious Princess
summary: A classic JRPG. Play the role of a princess, gather partners in a desperate situation, and embark on a legendary journey to save the kingdom and make peace.

name: Peter Rabbit: Hidden World
summary:
Search for hidden objects in the world of Peter Rabbit
Introducing the second Peter Rabbit game by Poppin Games, creators of hit app Peter Rabbit's Garden (over 3 million downloads)!
Search for hidden objects in cute illustrations that faithfully recreate the style of the original books.

name: Pewt 'em Up!
summary: Pewt 'em Up! is a retro inspired arcade space shoot 'em up with lots of upgrades, achievements, extras and more.

name: Pedro Land DX
summary: An intense, retro run-and-gun platformer western game!

name: Penguins Can Fly
summary: An indie penguin simulation game where you upgrade your igloo to make it the coolest igloo ever, create power stations on the outskirts of your island to generate power and money, and eventually launch yourself to the moon to prove that penguins can indeed fly!

name: People are Labyrinths
summary: An investigation of the concept of labyrinths, mazes, emotional exploration, and mutual intimacy.

name: Penny Dell Jumbo Crosswords 2
summary: Penny Dell Jumbo Crosswords 2 includes 150 all-new crossword puzzles to challenge and stimulate your mind.

name: Petit Island
summary: Welcome to the beautiful and tropical Petit Island! Relive your grandpaw's youthful adventures by exploring the island and capturing beautiful photos in this heartwarming open-world photo exploration game. Preserve his memories before they fade away!

name: Pentiment
summary: A 16th-century narrative adventure set in Upper Bavaria, following Andreas Maler, a journeyman artist working in the bygone scriptorium of Kiersau Abbey during a time of great social unrest. While finishing his masterpiece, Andreas inadvertently becomes entangled in a series of murders that take place over 25 years. Peasants, thieves, craftsmen, monks, nuns, nobles, and even saints must be investigated and interrogated to expose the truth.

name: Perfect Jump
summary: This is a relaxing casual game, you need to operate the character to keep jumping to get points

name: PearPhone.io
summary: PearPhone.io is a dynamic, free 3D-Multiplayer-Shooter game with battles in realtime. Combat against other players all around the world or intelligent bots and feel unlimited action! Host private matches and have fun with your friends in exciting combats!

name: Perfect Boyfriend
summary: Moving to another city is always stressful: new people, new places, new rules. Fortunately, the city is full of guys who will be happy to help you. Who knows, maybe one of them could become more than just a friend, huh?

name: Periphery
summary: A refugee capsule lands on an uninhabited planet. You have to survive, rebuild civilization and, if possible, regain control over the Earth. One big universe, one endless pvp session for all players.

name: Perfect Partner
summary: Perfect Partner is a party game with 2 people work closely together to defeat other teams to win. The road to the championship is full of obstacles, your teammates may be your worst enemy! Have fun in this game or meet the soul mate you are most acquainted with here.

name: Pentominovich
summary: A remake the block-stacking line-clearing classic... except it's not.

name: Pet Rock
summary:
Get ready to rock 'n roll - the official Pet Rock featured in “Minions: The Rise of Gru” is now available on the Nintendo Switch console!

Adopt your very own Pet Rock to nurture from a baby pebble to a full grown stone-cold adult by regularly feeding, cleaning, training and keeping your Pet Rock happy by playing its favorite games - Rock Paper Scissors - all included here.

name: Peepo Island
summary: A difficult obstacle course 3D platformer where the goal is to survive and escape the Island!

name: Pet Shop Hop
summary:
Hop to it in order to save your family's pet shop from being gobbled up by MegaPet Superstore!
Sell pets and accessories to challenging customers!
Keep the shop clean, the animals fed, and use tips to upgrade the decor or your resources!

name: Penny Dreadfuls: Sweeney Todd - Premium Edition
Penguin Puzzle
summary: Penguin Puzzle is a puzzle game where you slide colored ice cubes around to either create a 2x2 or 3x2 square of the same color, or match the bonus shape shown to the right. With every move, more ice cubes appear, so plan your moves well. Every five levels, a bonus level will fill the screen with ice cubes. Click on a block to remove all connected ice cubes of the same color. After removing those, the remaining ice cubes will fall down to take their place.

name: Perfect Murder
summary:
Slovak murder simulator text adventure game in which the player can kill a person of their choosing (by entering their name) and then cover up the tracks. One can explicitly choose to murder an "unpopular politician."

Received an English translation in 2021 as part of an initiative by the Slovak Game Developers Association in cooperation with Slovak Design Museum, with funding by the Slovak Arts Council.

name: Pepsi Cola
summary:
Slovak text adventure game wherein the player tries to break into a house to steal a secret recipe for Pepsi Cola. Music is taken from Trantor: The Last Stormtrooper.

Received an English translation in 2021 as part of an initiative by the Slovak Game Developers Association in cooperation with Slovak Design Museum, with funding by the Slovak Arts Council.

name: Petz Puppyz and Kittenz
summary: Care for and love the most adorable puppy and kitten duo as you help them grow and become best friends.

name: Petz Horseshoe Ranch
summary: Learn how to take care of your very own family of horses!

name: Petz Hamsterz Bunch
summary: Raise, care and play with a family of hamsters on the PSP! Adopt a hamster and customize your pet's look with tons of fun types and colors. Keep them occupied and watch them grow as you become the proud parent of hamsters.

name: Pen Guns
summary: PEN GUNS is a first-person coloring book. Choose from 4 available paintings and do your best to fill them with proper colors before the time limit is up!

name: Pencil Case TD
summary: Pencil Case TD is a tower defense game with pencil cases and stationery as the theme. Players need to use different stationery to guard their scores to get promoted.

name: Pentacore
summary: Pentacore is a metroidvania with a focus on platforming and exploration. Run, shoot, climb, and blast your way through a massive world. All in order to find five keys and leave your prison of a planet.

name: Peekazoo
summary: Peekazoo is a party game about animals playing hide-and-seek on a 4–10 person luxury cruise liner. Crewmates should avoid being attacked and complete their mission while watching out for impostors who are ready to attack your crewmates and sabotage the mission.

name: PegSoli+
summary: "PegSoli+" is a game based on the rules of the classic board game Peg Solitaire (or Solo Noble), with some modifications.

name: Peace for Ukraine
summary: Military shooter about Ukrainian / Russia crisis 2022

name: Peaky Circus
summary: When The Mime was a kid, his dad and most of his community was killed in a war but luckily his uncle helped him and his mother to escape the town. The mime was hiding in the woods and The Uncle helped them with the food and other essentials, mime is now ready to fight with the murderer of his dad.

name: Peaky Blinders: The King's Ransom
summary: Infiltrate their criminal underworld, earn the Shelbys’ trust and prove you have what it takes to join the Peaky Blinders in The King’s Ransom, a dark VR action-adventure based on the epic gangster drama.

name: Pets in Action Bundle
summary: Pets in Action includes four CUTE indie games from QUByte Interactive. Dive into this bundle to get in love with all the pets!

name: Percy Parcel
summary: VR Warehouse Survival Action. Stock shelves to survive a week in the warehouse.

name: Pep-Pel
summary: Run through each level as Pep-Pel! a goofy red goblin thing. In this beautifully hand drawn game. play through tons of fast-paced and difficult levels, each with there own challenge to master!

name: Pest Control
summary: A fast paced garden defense game. Collect what you can before the pests take over!

name: Pens: Ballad of the Erasers
summary: A thrilling action/adventure platformer where you jump, run and shoot your way through a weaving narrative in a comical world!

name: Pedal to the Metal
summary: Race around the track across 9 unique locations to achieve the fastest time on the leaderboard.

name: Petit Four
summary: Petit Four is an otome game for PS2.

name: Penny Blood
summary:
Penny Blood is a alternative history horror JRPG and spiritual successor to the Shadow Hearts series led by former Shadow Hearts series director, Matzuso Machida.

The year is 1923 and American PI Matthew Farrell is tasked by the Bureau of Investigation to investigate a New York asylum overtaken by supernatural entities. Matthew's mission soon takes him across the world as he battles an otherworldly threat alongside a group of allies.

name: Petz: My Baby Panda
summary: Take care of a baby panda.

name: Perfect Tides: Station to Station
summary: A point n' click sequel to Perfect Tides about the momentum and whiplash of young adulthood.

name: Periphery Synthetic
summary: Explore a planetary system, synthesize new abilities, and reveal its past. This interactive EP offers a chill and non-violent metroidvania experience across procedurally-generated musical playgrounds.

name: Pete's Peril
summary: Solving puzzles of all skill levels, dodging boulders, grabbing diamonds, upgrading tools, clothing for different climates and crush enemies along the way is all part of Pete's Peril.

name: Petite Adventure
summary: Time to rev up your tiny engines for some huge fun! Control a miniature vehicle and drive your way around household obstacles

name: Pets Hotel
