summary: Welcome to Pets Hotel, a place where you can start the business you always dreamed of! Pets Hotel gives you a unique opportunity to build, design, and run a place where pets can feel at home. Cats, dogs, turtles, and many other animals are waiting for you to take proper care of them!

name: Persian Empire Builder
summary: Dominate the ancient world economically and conquer it leading the greatest empire known in history of mankind. As a ruler of Persia build cities, roads and aqueducts, develop your economy, settle disputes, issue orders to armies and fleet.

name: Peregrine
summary: After escaping from an inevitable death you have been chosen to wield the Desolation Blade. While wielding it you can bring justice to those who brought death and destruction to earth and enslaved mankind.

name: Pengo
summary: Is a port for Bandai portable handheld.

name: Personal Chef to the Stars
summary: “Personal Chef to the Stars” is a menu management simulator, Romantic Comedy Yuri Visual Novel, and Dating Sim. Play as Chef Ayesha Rogers as she must balance the needs and desires of a household filled with eccentric celebrities while also managing her own budding love life.

name: Petty's Adventure: Desert
summary: Petty's Adventure: Desert is a colorful game with changing gravity in which you have collect crystals to complete a level.

name: Penrose
summary: A Game Boy/flash era-style horror game about memory, identity, and finding your way out.

name: PermaNight
summary: Survive in a world full of darkness. Gain resources. Kill entities. Repeat. But beware, there might be entities lurking around...

name: Permanent Sleep
summary: Permanent sleep is a roleplaying detective adventure game. Players will play the role of detective Kylin and police Jonas, and investigate the mysterious serial murders as well.

name: Pet Pat
summary:
Pet Pat, is a fast-paced game where players swipe, tap and hold in order to pet cute animals before they burst into tears!
Complete cute and fun challenges!
Tame magically adorable beasts!
Hug your cuddly little pets the most to get the best score!

name: Personal Space
summary: An anti-social roguelike for the ages. Humans may be social creatures, but you sure as heck aren't! Use a variety of items and abilities to ensure your "survival" against hoards extroverted people. Be persistent, and keep your distance. No violence required.

name: Perseus: Titan Slayer
summary:
Perseus: Titan Slayer is an over-the-top hack and slash, rogue-like adventure that focuses on depth and branching choices which allow for multiple unique runs. Branching choices allow for custom runs and many opportunities to play again and try new builds. Wield a Sword, Dagger, Bow, or Katana, each with their own special abilities. Feel like a real Olympian and explore the secrets of each weapon.
Meet Zeus, Poseidon, Hermes, and many other Olympians and gain their legendary upgrades.
Hack and slash through hordes of enemies as you make your way into Tartarus on an epic journey to fight Hades and the Titans.
It doesn’t matter how you want to play this game or what style you want to use. A shopkeeper system allows players to make unique builds whether you want to be a Tank, Agile, DPS or even a double spell caster on your adventure.

name: Penguin no Mondai+ Bakushou! Roulette Battle!!
Petals
summary: Petals is a first-person photography game, developed as part of an ARG promoting Gun Interactive's The Texas Chain Saw Massacre.

name: Pengreens
summary: Deliver different equipment onto trucks, Manipulate a path to move on, Navigate between platform puzzles and rebuild Penguinland. Carry Ice Blocks along the levels, avoiding to break Carbon Boxes, while planning ahead to beat thight time requeriments, in this level based puzzle platformer.

name: Pedra Crystal Caves
summary: Pedra Crystal Caves is an addictive puzzle game where you have to find and paint all the key tiles which open the exit door to each cave. Play solo or local co-op. 48 caves to choose from.

name: Perfect Inventory
summary: Perfect Inventory is an organization puzzle game that brings you to a medieval age in the role of a methodical squire trying to make his best to fit all the items perfectly into the inventory.

name: Pendulo Adventure Pack
summary: Pendulo Adventure pack includes 5 beautifully produced adventure games, with rich scenarios, ever-present humour and captivating puzzles.

name: PenguInn
summary: PenguInn is a classic single-player 2D platformer that takes you on a journey through a dream world made in AI-generated art. Collect beautiful art by completing 100 levels before waking up from your dream.

name: Perry the Pumpkin
summary: Perry the Pumpkin needs to save Halloween! In this epic platformer with RPG elements, you will learn secrets about the mayhem surrounding the spookiest of holidays. Perry will spit out pumpkin seeds to stop enemies and learn new abilities to help him with his mission.

name: Peebi
summary: Use your wit, sarcasm and a general lack of regard for others in this Point-n-Click adventure. Full of bad humour, bizarre decor and a world of inconveniences, with clues hidden in plain sight, problems with unusual solutions and an alt-culture flair.

name: Peck'Em
summary: Peck'Em is a chaotically casual multiplayer 3D arena fighting game featuring cute pigeons and over-the-top fight sequences. It is set in a future where all humans have left for the stars and made pigeons the guardians of Earth.

name: P.E.P
summary: P.E.P Is an online 8 Player PvEvP game set in a zombie filled coastal United States City.

name: Pesticide
summary: Pesticide is a raw reflex action FPS that puts heavy emphasis on speed, accuracy and total mayhem against nasty cockroach thugs and gangsters. Exterminate them all through the desolate and filthy city districts, collect trophies and save adult actress Pussy Katty from their clutches.

name: People Versus Everything
summary: It's a bird! It's a plan! It's a garbage can? Face your friends in this ridiculous cat-and-mouse free-to-play shooter. Become a prop and hide within your environment, or become a hunter. Use guns, abilities, and occasionally trains to win the game!

name: Pet Shop Snacks: Premium Edition
summary: Welcome to Pet Shop Snacks! Upgrade your bar, beautify it and stock up on the very best ingredients. Let your restaurant be the talk of the town! Learn crazy recipes from the famous dog star chef!

name: Perfect Ball
summary:
You go on a long journey as a ball. All you have to do is get to the top.

You can't move alone. Because you're a ball without arms or legs. However, even if you can't move on your own, it's possible to move the ground you're standing on. Rotate and tilt the ground so that you can climb up!

Of course, it will not be an easy journey. You can't stop or jump up wherever you want. Also, all kinds of obstacles will interfere with you.

However, don't give up and go up. It doesn't matter how many times you fail. Even if it takes a lot of time, put all your strength into it, tilt the ground, and reach the top along with the tilted land.

The top of the lonely world will wait for you forever.

name: Peek a Boo
summary: Multiple boy-scouts get pushed inside an abandoned house to pass courage challenges. What they don't know though is that Ethel, the girl that organizes the challenges, hides a monstrous secret inside the house. Play in the role of one of the unlucky boy-scouts: collect keys, wander through the rooms without making sound, hide in the darkness and run away from the demon that resides in the cursed house.

name: Perfect Memento of Touhou Question: More 50 Questions Part 1
summary: More 50 questions for Perfect Memento of Touhou Question, this is the part 1 of all the DLCs.

name: Perfect Memento of Touhou Question: More 50 Questions Part 2
summary: More 50 questions for Perfect Memento of Touhou Question, this is the part 2 of all the DLCs.

name: Permanence
summary:
Rook is lost.

He was trying to fulfill a debt of gratitude. Indeed, he was compelled, duty-bound by his very nature to fulfill it. The situation, however, got out of hand, forcing him to abandon his friend lest he be destroyed.

Of course, this was intolerable. He swore to her he would repay her kindness! He SWORE it! To leave her to struggle alone in her time of need...! It wasn't long before he began seeking her out in earnest to make things right.

name: Petadachi
summary:
Raise adorable pets in Petadachi. ​Explore with your pet. Play with your pet. Care for your pet. Love your pet.
Learn your pet's unique likes and dislikes. Go fishing with your pet. Shop for items. Search for items in tall grass.
There's so much to discover in Petadachi.

name: Peak Angle: Drift Online - Japan Cars Pack
summary: Expand Peak Angle: Drift Online with Japan Cars Pack DLC! From Japan come 4 Cars and 1 Wide Body Kit that everyone will want in their garage!

name: Pepper Girl
summary: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Perncops Virtual Rig
summary: Take the gaming experience to a whole new level and bring your favorite PC games to VR, simply connect your HMD to your pc and immediately play your games without a need for game specific patches or mods through one of the virtual rigs to emulate racing wheels, yokes and game specific controllers.

name: Per Aspera: Buildings Paint Pack
summary: The Building Paint Pack is a cosmetic DLC that includes new skins for all your buildings no matter what stage of the terraforming plan your savegame is in.

name: Pearls of Atlantis: The Cove
summary: Play 600+ match-3 puzzles! Challenge yourself with unique physics gameplay and rebuild Atlantis.

name: Peko Pop
summary:
Move your fingers around the sweet & sour Fruits
Match 3 or more of them to POP!
Mind-popping missions await you at every stage
Use various items to clear the stages sweeter & easier

If you love Peko and enjoy puzzle games, you must try it!

name: Pepsi Summer Quest
summary: Pepsi Summer Quest is a summer fun themed isometric runner Playable Ad. The player collects coolers of Pepsi as she navigates through a fun filled world of surprises & delights. Each cooler collected is rewarded with a Pepsi Power Up, and a unique musical track is layered onto the beat. A new song is created upon completion of each level, featuring a unique Pepsi product.

name: Penguin Chat 3
summary: Penguin Chat 3 is an online multiplayer game by RocketSnail Games, which later served as part of the basis for what would eventually become Club Penguin several years later.

name: Peppy Mario
summary: Here is a Super Mario Bros. hack which increases the speed of enemies & projectiles coming at you at an alarming high speed rate. Can you dodge your enemies & obstacles in this high paced challenge?

name: Peppa Pig: World Adventures
summary: Play in the bigger, wider world of Peppa Pig, and bring your family into the story! Make pizza in Italy, walk on Hollywood Boulevard, climb the Eiffel Tower and more on your world tour. Create your own unique and dazzling family home, and discover more characters, quests and fun than ever before!

name: Pet Pals 2: Best of Friends
summary: Explore feelings and emotions as you adopt and take care of your very own puppy.

name: Perilous Wilde
summary: Perilous Wilde follows the valiant Amelya Conner and her forest band of exiles as they plot a town's rescue against villainous invaders.

name: Perilous Swamp
summary: Find the Princess and exit the swamp. BTW, there's monsters too!

name: Penny Arcade: Spider-Man 3: Bell Tower Brawl
summary: Penny Arcade: Spider-Man 3: Bell Tower Brawl 3 is an LCD game based on Spider-Man.

name: Persona 2: Eternal Punishment
summary:
Persona 2: Eternal Punishment is a 2000 role-playing video game by Atlus for the PlayStation. It is chronologically the third installment in the Persona series, a subseries of the Megami Tensei franchise. The game was later remade by Atlus for the PlayStation Portable. This version, released in Japan in 2012, did not receive an overseas release. In response to this, the PlayStation version was released on PlayStation Network in 2013.

Eternal Punishment takes place in the fictional Japanese city of Sumaru, and is a direct sequel to Persona 2: Innocent Sin. Taking place a few months after Innocent Sin, the game follows reporter Maya Amano as she investigates the Joker Curse, a malign phenomenon where people's wishes and rumors are coming true and causing chaos. During her investigations, she and others who join her gain the ability to summon Personas, personified aspects of their personalities. The gameplay features turn-based battle gameplay, where characters use their Personas in battle against demons, and a separate Rumor system, where rumors spread around the city can influence events in the characters' favor, either bad or good.

name: Pense Bem
summary: A quiz video game based on a toy line manufactured by Tec Toy. It features questions for 10 different themes, and is usually released built-in consoles by Tec Toy. Some times these consoles consider it as 10 different games.

name: Pet Dragon Girl
summary: Every true dragon keeps treasures and precious stones in her cave. For what? What else is she to do, between hibernation and protecting her treasure from brave adventurers? This story is about such an adventurer and how he tamed the dragon...

name: Peachy Boy
summary: Peachy Boy, This cute looking puzzle game is as hard as it looks cute. Can you beat the challenging 30 levels? Each level is specially designed. You have to collect the key and pass the level, but be careful!

name: Penance
summary: Destroy sin, earn your peace.

name: Persona 3 Portable & Persona 4 Golden Bundle
summary: From the Midnight Channel to the Dark Hour, two iconic Persona titles return!

name: Penguin Paradise
summary: Penguin Paradise is a variant of the popular game Gorilla Tag. It can be accessed inside the App Lab for Oculus Quest. What makes it unique is a combination of its snow/ice themes and the fact it regularly adds non-tag game modes.

name: Pet Peaves Monsters
summary: Three new spooky species have emerged...Battle them in an all new Haunted Hallow-arena! Then raise new pets and see if you can discover your own to keep!

name: Pet Paradise Story
summary:
Pet Paradise Story is a funny and joyful game where you’ll travel through a match 3 puzzle adventure! Come join our cheerful doggie, grumpy cat and little guinea piggie for their exciting journey! Travel through the countryside, beach, farm and pets resort looking for tasty treats!
A joyful match 3 game for pet & animal lovers to make your day happier! Woof woof meow!
During the adventure are offerings of achievements, combos and power ups.
Switch and slide the board of delicious foods to create matches of 3 or more as you trigger combos and feed your beautiful pets yummy treats. Reward them with tinned meat, fish, milk, dog biscuit, vegetable and hay cube they love!
The game also has a lot of interesting power ups like magic bomb, magic shuffle and super pet power that will help on difficult levels. Come challenge your friends and invite them to enjoy the amazing FREE puzzle games!
Switch and slide the board of delicious foods to create matches of 3 or more as you trigger combos and feed your beautiful pets yummy treats. Reward them with tinned meat, fish, milk, dog biscuit, vegetable and hay cube they love!
The game also has a lot of interesting power ups like magic bomb, magic shuffle and super pet power that will help on difficult levels. Come challenge your friends and invite them to enjoy this amazing FREE puzzle game!

name: Pellet Dodge
summary: A simple indie game about rescuing your friend from being used to fuel the corruption of the Universe.

name: Per Aspera: Home
summary: This journey is not over yet, we have much more to do!

name: Percy the Potty Pigeon
summary: In this side-scrolling egg-em-up, released in 1984, take on the role of Percy as he struggles to build a nest and feed his needy offspring. Contains both the Commodore 64 and ZX Spectrum versions of the game.

name: Peak.53
summary: Peak.53 is a tactical shooter developed by Dirty Bird Games - bringing back close-quarter fights, skill-based tactical combat, nostalgic inspired gameplay, and unique team communication.

name: Perseverance: Complete Edition
summary: Persevere through family troubles, small-town drama, and… zombie apocalypse as Jack and Karen in Perseverance: Complete Edition!

name: Pen Fight
summary: Knock your opponent’s pens off the table by flicking your pen against theirs! Pen Fight is a fantastic new game that combines simple controls, great physics, and an element of strategy.

name: Penguin Massacre
summary: Defend your igloo and keep shooting the penguins with bigger and better guns, simple as that.

name: Petz
summary: Dogz and Catz look to you for care, guidance, and training. Sign an adoption pledge promising to be a good Petz owner. Weather effects and day-and-night cycles provide a more realistic setting. Playscenes and mini-games create a whole new interactive experience. There is a variety of dog and cat breedz to choose from.

name: Pelé: Soccer Legend
summary:
The official soccer game featuring greatest footballer Pelé.
Pelé: Soccer Legend is a new soccer experience with streamlined gesture controls, featuring the legend himself! Follow in Pelé’s footsteps in career mode and work your way from the backstreets of Brazil all the way up to become world champion

name: Persona 3 Portable
summary:
If I say there’s an hour “hidden” between one day and the next... would you believe me? Master the power of the heart, Persona, and uncover the tragic truth of the Dark Hour.

Experience the iconic, critically acclaimed RPG that reinvented the Persona series, Persona 3 Portable.

name: Persona 4 Golden
summary:
A coming of age story that sets the protagonist and his friends on a journey kickstarted by a chain of serial murders.

Now available on modern platforms, the world-renowned Persona 4 Golden promises unforgettable adventures, meaningful bonds, and heartwarming experiences.

name: Persha and the Magic Puzzle: Arabian Nyaights
summary: Persha and the Magic Puzzle is a new kind of puzzle RPG that combines 3-match puzzle and dungeon RPG. Control the main character "Persha," a young girl, to solve the mysteries of the tower and catch your nemesis "Rock"!

name: PetShop
summary: "PetShop" is the app that exports VRM format avatars with pets & items. Dogs, cats, sharks, squirrels, elephants, dragons, and many other animals. You can also use animal ears, tails and hats. The exported avatars can be used in VRM compatible metaverse. Join the Metaverse with "PetShop"!

name: Penguin with a Pumpgun
summary: Get ready for the zombie penguins! Penguin with a Pumpgun is a 2D retro-inspired roguelike set in a zombie infected hospital. Gun your way through 13 floors of horror and escape the hospital, while upgrading your character and weapon. Can you get to the ground floor to make your escape?

name: Peaceful Lands
summary: Peaceful land is a relaxing building strategy game where you create a beautiful and ever-growing village landscape by placing tiles. Discover, complete quests to unlock new tiles and watch your beatiful land growing.

name: PetrolHead: Epic Joyride
summary: Petrolhead will provide you the high quality graphics and the driving experience you are looking for. Test your overspeed skills and drift skills on asphalt. Push your limits and step forward to become a master driver! Complete the missions, own the best cars and challenge worldwide drivers!

name: Pedestal
summary:
One month ago, Cosmos Girls' Academy student Shiori Natsume was found dead on campus.

Though rumor spreads that it was suicide, Aoi Ooe of the newspaper club wants to know if that's really true.

Accompanied by her friend Akari, she begins an investigation to uncover the truth - no matter what may come of it.

name: Peaks of Yore
summary: Travel around The Great Gales to climb challenging peaks in this physics-based climbing adventure set in 1887. Meet like-minded mountaineers, unlock helpful climbing gear, and become a pioneer of mountaineering.

name: Penguin Pairs
summary: Penguin Pairs is a pairs matching game with colorful sea animals, magic sounds and the "Pop the balloons" mini game. A game for the whole family.

name: Petit Petit Petit
summary: Get ready for an exciting and refreshing adventure! In this thrilling game, you will be in charge of manipulating immune cells and medical nanomachines to fight off invading pathogens and save unknown creatures from deadly diseases.

name: Perfection
summary: Players have a set amount of time to match the shape in the center screen. Once they find the match, they have push the large bubble button. Try to match all the shapes before your time is up.

name: Pet
summary:
Pet is a horror visual novel about being in a city after a fun day out and how sometimes you gotta get home to take care of your cat.

It's a late night on an unseasonably warm day. On your way home to feed your cat Kuma, you stumble upon a vending machine in a dark alley.

name: PES 2018 Mobile
summary: The mobile port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2018.

name: Peasant Kingdom
summary: Peasant Kingdom is a multiplayer survival game in which the player starts as a poor peasant and can eventually develop into a powerful king with his own castle.

name: Penalty Shooters Footy
summary: It's time for some penalty shootout, most nervy part of any football game. The stadium is full, and you can feel the pressure of the crowd while you concentrate. Is it going to be a goal or not? Are you calm and skillful enough to kick your team all the way to the finals? Check out this great, spiced with humor, football game.

name: Penny Larceny: Gig Economy Supervillain
summary: Join Penny in planning and executing daring heists across the city, and navigate the intricate web of alliances and betrayals that makes up the criminal underworld. With snappy comic book artwork, a swinging soundtrack of electro-jazz and a multiverse-spanning storyline of victories and disasters, Penny Larceny is a must-play for visual novel fans. Are you ready to embark on the heist of a lifetime?

name: Perfect Swing
summary: Compete in real-time multiplayer games against golfers from all around the world in Match play.

name: Pet Cube: Tower Stack
summary: Stack the cubes as high as you can! Simple & adorable graphics. Compete with players around the world, earn yourself a spot on the leaderboard!

name: Petdise Tycoon
summary:
Petdise - A one-stop service center; a paradise for pets!
Can you successfully run your own pet center?

This is a casual, easy game. By making strategic decisions, you will successfully manage a pet center and achieve profitable results. Start with an ordinary pet grooming salon to build the best pet service empire!

name: Pencil Plus: The Wrath of The Spankster
summary: Pencil Plus: The Wrath of the Spankster is an interactive novel style choose your own adventure game in which players take the role of Conner, a normal high school kid that gains a very unique super power: the ability to pull limitless pencils out of his pockets.

name: PeopleWillMoney
summary: People generate money if they are working, but it costs money if they are not working. It is important to build facilities as quickly as and keep people around. Keep building facilities silently, or use policy to other players. The player with the most assets at the end of the game wins.

name: Persona5: The Phantom X
summary: Persona 5: The Phantom X is a spin-off of Persona 5, and is officially authorized by SEGA with deep involvement by Atlus.

name: Perfect Detective Manual
summary: Adventure point-and-click game. Production and planning made by Pleasuredome, Inc., and distribution was handled by Dynaware, Inc.

name: Persona 4 Colors
summary: Persona 4 Colors is a game designed for Japanese feature phones that stars the cast of Persona 4 in a set of four minigames.

name: Pet Pad
summary: Pet Pad was a digital pack-in game with LeapPad Explorer consoles that allowed you to have a virtual pet.

name: Peace Is Your Destiny
summary: Peace is Your Destiny is a relaxing trip across an everlasting and colorful ocean. Clear islands by rolling your cube to match colored tiles. You will uncover surprises along the way towards a calmer and chill mindset. Its will Remove your anxiety and you will enter the world of Peace.

name: Peck Peck's Garden
summary:
Throw seeds to feed Peck Peck and watch the magic.
Find the secret way to grow flowers to harvest more seeds.

name: Perfect Fit
summary: Casual drop box fit in the gap game

name: Pecker
summary: Pecker offers a unique climbing mechanic in a colorful world filled with puzzles and some enemies.

name: Perikoto
summary: Discover the unending winter of Perikoto in this short VR horror adventure. Strange beings skulk in the forest, the crows are restless, and you have no place to call home. Where will you wander?

name: Pedal Up!
summary: Hang on tight - Pedal Up! takes you out to some awesome riding spots to hone your skills in the sport of bike trials. Use your balance, technique, skill and timing to get through tons of sections. The whole point of trials is to get over and around anything without putting your feet down. Do you have what it takes?

name: Perfect Hand of Nostalpix
summary: Perfect Hand of Nostalpix is a remaster of the 1989 digital card game classic. Defeat your foes with a deck you tweaked to perfection by collecting, upgrading and evolving each card, in this blast from the past enhanced with new mechanics!

name: Penitent Dead
summary: PSX Fantasy Horror. There are whispers that the Endlyss have arisen. As a Knight of the Black Order, you have been called upon to investigate.

name: Persona 3 Social
summary: Persona 3 Social is a free-to-play Persona 3 spin-off developed for the Mobage-town Japanese social network-enabled mobile phones.

name: Perquisite Strata X
summary: A Boom-compatible port of the exclusive levels found in the PSX port of DOOM.

name: Pets Crossing
summary: A Frogger clone featuring a green cat; also called Cross River.

name: Pet Dog
summary: A virtual pet game where you must raise one of three puppies, likely released amidst the Nintendogs craze. A Chinese-language version was released as a Nanjing cartridge, which contains a battery to save progress; an English version was included on several plug & plays, but it cannot save progress.

name: Penguin Noir
summary: One fateful night, while Penguin P.I. Giuseppe Squawks is out to dinner with his dearest girlfriend, a seemingly random explosion takes his loved one from him. Now, aided by an octopus named Tony the Tickler, he must hunt down the Mafioso who orchestrated the accident and bring him to justice.

name: Perfect Dice
summary: A card-based roguelike game where all decisions are made through dice rolls. Assemble a deck of special cards and dice, skillfully manipulate randomness, defeat enemies, and find the Perfect Dice to help you regain your free will.

name: Penalty Madness
summary:
Are you a furious fan? Is football is everything for you? Penalty Madness will give you a unique opportunity to test your accuracy and prove to all other players that you are the best. Score goals, do not get into the players - this is all you need to know to start.
Collect cups, unlock a whole ton of players and balls in the most incredible images.
Every ten rounds a fan round passes, collecting a fan dictionary. There has never been a better time to play in Penalty Madness, so rather wear your sneakers and hit the ball with power.

name: Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie
summary: Nintendo DS port of Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie.

name: Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie
summary: PlayStation Portable port of Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie.

name: Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie
summary: Xbox 360 version of Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie.

name: Peepers
summary: A text based RPG that can be played in your web browser.

name: Pet Shop Simulator
summary: Run your own pet shop in Pet Shop Simulator! Find new homes for pets, thus fulfilling the dreams of your customers. Take care of the needs of animals by selling the right items and get involved in matters related to the pets' home life!

name: Pet Sanctuary
summary: Pet Sanctuary is a relaxing game where you take care of your pets. From feeding them fruit to choosing a favorite outfit, you take care of and nature your chosen pet in this bright and joyful world. Plus, with mini games like Snake and Simon Says, you can earn rewards that your pet will love.

name: Peraglees: The Ooloufian Resistance
summary: Peraglees - The Ooloufian Resistance is the first furry fandom video game to kick-ass and chew fur! With retro inspired visuals and authentic FM music to keep the action pumping while you blast through hordes of enemies. Peraglees is an Action Arcade shooter with RPG elements in Story mode.

name: Pegafuerte el Terrible
summary: You are a man with a mission: shoot all the aliens that are trying to take over the world and rescue your little town "the powerful candle" Side scrolling platform game, similar to "Metal Slug", single player, offline, many checkpoints and varied levels!

name: Pegdrop Hearts
summary: A relaxing Peggle-like game with a cozy and emotional theme that will warm your heart, while you learn about love and self-respect. It's a relaxing Pachinko game for you to chill.

name: Peekaboo Lite
summary: A Cross-Platform Hide & Seek online game. Players are divided into two teams: Props and Hunters. Props hide, taking the form of objects and adopting their physical properties, and hunters try with all their might to find them.

name: Petrovich and all, all, all...
summary: A humorous point & click game based on Andrei Bilzho's caricatures. The game introduces us to how and what that same Petrovich and other historical figures live on today. At 25 levels of the game we meet Pushkin, Grandfather Mazai, Chapaev, Kolobok, aliens and many other characters.

name: Peculiarities of National Fishing
summary: "Peculiarities of National Fishing" is a Puzzle/Arcade game based on the popular 1998's STV TV movie of the same name.

name: Pechka
summary: This game portrays the tragic history of war in a 2D adventure format, set against real events. It provides a realistic experience, encompassing themes of betrayal, death, and love, while also offering multiple endings driven by player choices. Discover the impact of this era's tragedy firsthand

name: Personal Sam-Y
summary: A SAM-Y of your very own.

name: PebbleDash
summary: Race online as pebbles in this blazing non-stop, unpredictable multiplayer platformer! From drunk mode, to golfing; no match is like the last! But why are the pebbles racing? Find out in a short, yet vivid story mode, featuring a rich and luminous cast of characters with charming dialogue.

name: Petrolhead Paradise
summary: Welcome to Petrolhead Paradise, the digital playground for all car lovers around the world! Are you ready to sit behind the wheel of many different iconic cars and earn in-game money by speeding and drifting across over 25 environments, even across endless highway roads? Test your skills in over 60 difficult career challenges consisting of Time Attack, Autocross and Drift events. Show off your driving skills in order to unlock many amazing cars and mods and also play with your friends in an online free roam multiplayer mode or compete with them in multiplayer drag races!

name: Persona 3 Reload
summary:
Step into the shoes of a transfer student thrust into an unexpected fate when entering the hour "hidden" between one day and the next. Awaken an incredible power and chase the mysteries of the Dark Hour, fight for your friends, and leave a mark on their memories forever.

Persona 3 Reload is a captivating reimagining of the genre-defining RPG, reborn for the modern era.

name: Persona 5 Tactica
summary: After a strange incident, the Phantom Thieves wander into a bizarre realm where its citizens are living under tyrannical oppression. Surrounded by a military group named Legionnaires, they find themselves in grave danger until a mysterious revolutionary named Erina rescues them and offers an enticing deal in exchange for their help. What truth lies behind Erina and the deal she offers to the Phantom Thieves.

name: PersoNO 0
summary:
PersoNO 0 is a full-length original parody of Persona 3, and a sequel/prequel to the original (and kinda crappy) PersoNO, that centralizes the themes of death and moving on after loss... or maybe it just centralizes an apathetic, tender man with one eye trying to get some alone time with his robot girlfriend.

Step into the shoes of renameable protagonist Chungus Munshin--your ordinary 17 year old boy with dead parents, one eye, blue hair and seemingly no emotions. Life finally seems like it's looking up for Chungus as he transfers to Gekkoukan High School, and even receives a personal invitation to stay at the Iwatodai Dorm. He even makes some interesting new friends who are eager to pretend like they don't know him!

However, after an unfortunate incident involving a large blob monster and a gun, Chungus learns that he's had a hidden talent all along: calling forth a vuvuzela-wielding Persona by the name of Orpheus by shooting himself in the head! After this little stunt, Chungus accidentally ends up leading the group known as SEES in their battles against the entities known as Shadows as they fight to find a way to end the Dark Hour with a reasonably low body count.

name: PersoNO
summary:
Per-so-NO is a dumb original parody of Persona 4, about lies, betrayal and mystery...

...Or maybe just an idiot with no eyes and his group of friends who for the most part are either scared of him or hate him.

Located in the glorious nation of Dubbed Japan, the small town of Inaba is suddenly struck with a terrible incident... the arrival of Useless Narukami, who can be easily identified by his constant wearing of sunglasses. To most people, he appears to be a massively unlikable weirdo with a libido big enough to crush continents, but in reality, he is a massively unlikable weirdo with a libido big enough to crush continents WITH THE HEART OF GOLD KIND OF. He moved from the city to the rural town due to very vague reasons involving his parents' jobs. How a job they are doing could require their child to have to live with his uncle in a small town for exactly a year before moving back is better left out of the question. But, soon after arriving, it all goes to bad when after the mysterious death of a woman in the town, Useless discovers he has the ability to stick his hand into his TV! At first it only appears to be a neat party trick, but after a foreplay joke or two, him and his newly found "friends" end up discovering a world that can only be accessed through entering a TV! Long story short, being that Useless is a special snowflake, he ends up with a massive dude with a flat cap and lead pipe living inside of his mind, the voice in his head called it a "Purse Owner" or something, and now with this power, him and his greatest buddies must venture into the TV World and slay shadows (copyright free .pngs with masks on) to learn the truth behind the mysterious murders going on in Inaba.

name: Penalti MTV com Cléston
summary: Penalti MTV com Cléston is a penalty soccer mobile game based around the Rockgol tournament featuring the musician and goalkeeper DJ Cléston.

name: PenguinLinks v2
summary: Do you love penguins? Then you got to love this fun puzzle game with cute penguins in costumes, representing all kinds of characters from your daily life: such as Lisa Simpson, Rodger Federer, Super Mario, Judoka player, Hulk, Cartman, incredibles, Viking, ... and many many more. Try this game and see if you can identify each of them!

name: Perfect Slices
summary: Chop like a real master. It's so satisfying!

name: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars
summary: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars is a thrilling real-time strategy (RTS)-lite game where players face off in an epic battle to determine which spread reigns supreme!

name: Penny's Big Breakaway
summary: Join Penny & Yo-Yo in a kinetic 3D-platformer bursting with innovative gameplay! Showcase your catalog of tricks and chain impressive combos to deliver Penny & Yo-Yo's perfect breakout performance. Take the stage with this vibrant pair in Penny’s Big Breakaway.

name: Penthouse Interactive: Virtual Photo Shoot Vol. 1
summary: You're a photographer who wants to work for Penthouse. Put together an ideal sexy pictorial for your portfolio and then, if hired, proceed to do the photo-shoot of your life.

name: Peter Frankl: Puzzle no Tou
summary: FMV puzzle collection

name: Pet Luv Spa and Resort Tycoon
summary:
To make money and reach the goal of each level you have to service the needs of the animals staying in your resort. Each animal will come to your resort with needs and an amount of money they are ready to spend. If the price of your rooms are equal or lower than what they are ready to afford the will rent a room in your resort. Animals will always try to rent the most expensive room available.

You service animals' needs by sending the animal to the proper stations where they will be serviced by your employees. If the animal is a V.I.P. (Very Important Pet) you'll have to service the pet's needs yourself. This is done through the minigames. Once all needs of an animal have been attended to the animal leaves your resort and pays you.

name: Per Aspera VR
summary: Per Aspera VR is a unique narrative simulation & strategy game specially designed for VR. Take control of AMI, the galaxy’s most sophisticated AI, tasked with an important mission: Terraform Mars and make it a habitable planet. You decide the future — terraform, make crucial narrative decisions, manage resources, discover long-hidden secrets, and immerse yourself in a rich and compelling story.

name: Pegasus II
summary: Introducing Pegasus II, a captivating variation of the classic Scramble game. Prepare for an exhilarating side-scrolling shoot 'em up experience as you navigate your ship across a majestic mountainous terrain. Engage in intense combat by strategically dropping bombs to obliterate enemy installations on the ground, while skillfully shooting down rockets with your ship's laser beams. Be prepared for aerial adversaries like birds, saucers, and dragons that emerge as you progress through the game. Remember, any contact with enemies or the ground results in a lost life, and you begin with five lives.

name: Pearlglow Cafe: Sweet Crumb Kisses
summary:
"With every wave, a new adventure..."

Near the edges of a seaside town, where salty breezes kiss skin and a radiant sun shines on the horizon, an enchanting cafe emerges... Owned and operated by an spirited young witch, every pastry she serves has a singular purpose: to spread boundless joy and compassion throughout the world.

Enter the world of Pearlglow Cafe and guide Juniper as she embarks on a charming journey filled with new beginnings, gentle romances, and delectably magical treats!

name: Peppa Pig: The Game
summary: Join in Peppa and Georges favourite games and activities. Play as either Peppa or George to complete 11 highly enjoyable games and activities including Car Wash, Kite Flying, Pancake Flipping, Hide and Seek and Colouring-in.

name: Persona 4 Arena Ultimax: P4A Story
summary: P4A Story (Persona 4 Arena Story) is a paid DLC for Persona 4 Arena Ultimax. This DLC enables you to play through the story of the original Persona 4 Arena with updated Persona 4 Arena Ultimax gameplay.

name: Pekoratchi
summary: Pekoratchi is an Tamagotchi Nano model based around the Hololive virtual YouTuber Usada Pekora.

name: Pesticide Not Required
summary: Mow down countless crops and corrupt critters while crafting game-breaking builds! Pesticide Not Required is a bullet heaven, horde survival roguelite with farming elements that offers a myriad of stats and special character traits to create wildly diverse run possibilities.

name: Penni's Adventure
summary: The Lightbearers have invaded, altering your world with technology! Save friends and send bears packing in this family-friendly action platformer!

name: Pet Shop Monogatari DS 2
summary: Japan-only sequel to My Pet Shop.

name: Penalty Soccer 2012
summary:
You cannot know Robert Baggio, Del Piero, Cristiano Ronaldo, Diego Maradona, neither know Juventus, Real Madrid, Manchester United,and even Brazil team, but you shouldn’t deny playing the game Penalty soccer 2012.
Penalty soccer 2012 is a simulation game of the real soccer.
The game will bring you into a decision on the fate of the soccer, which you can feel the moment be a life-and-death matter.

name: Penguin Armada
summary: Survival game taking place in dystopian future where AI is taking over. Interact with the heroes through live streaming sessions and be part of the unfolding adventure.

name: Perpetual Powers
summary: Perpetual Powers is a 21-level megawad made for and tested with GZDoom and Zandronum. The wad is split into three distinct episodes, each containing 7 maps - usually short to medium sized ones, with a large one to end the episode. The project is co-op compatible.

name: Pet Shop World
summary: Manage your own Pet Shop like no one else!

name: Perish: Exodus
summary: Face the new challenges of Perish: Exodus a completely free content update that exists alongside the main campaign, on June 28th. Turn your back briefly on Elysium to explore the Winds of the Anemoi: four unexplored realms filled with terrific remixes and augmentations of existing weapons, fiendish enemies and boss fights that are even bigger and more devilish than those in the main campaign.

name: Penelope
summary: Penelope.wad is a sort of bookend to my first year of mapping, and a distilled extract of everything I like in my mapping soup: complex architecture, out-there texturing, strange progression and a whole lot of atmosphere. There are also a few demons to kill, but nothing worrisome - little more than a nuisance. Only a few are archviles, and even fewer are cyberdemons and spider masterminds. Most combat is optional, and the exit can be reached in only a few minutes, though I'd invite you to stay for the whole experience if you will...

name: Persona 5 Royal: 1 More Edition
summary:
1 More Edition includes:

Treasure Chest Box - Collector’s box to hold your palace’s treasure.
Le Grimoire Art Frame - Plastic art frame inspired by Justine’s Le Grimoire clipboard.
Phantom Thieves Art Prints - Set of 5”x7” glossy high-quality prints made to be displayed in the included Frame.
Akechi’s Briefcase Bag - Akechi’s signature briefcase made into a 15” bag with logo on the front.
Arcana Tarot Card Deck - 24-card tarot deck featuring artwork of the arcana in a branded box.
Persona 5 Royal SteelBook Case - SteelBook game case featuring Persona 5 Royal artwork.
Physical Persona 5 Royal Game - Copy of Persona 5 Royal with over 40 items of previously released DLC included.

name: Penetration
summary:
So... you think you've got a great memory? ...we'll see!

Let Vanna TIght guide you through Penetration, one of ROMSOFT's finest adult CD-ROM-games. This fully interactive CD will challenge your memory as well as your sexual curiosity. Use your concentration to discover each match and be rewarded with over thirty high quality video clips, sensual graphics and a variety of erotic photos.

name: Perdition
summary: Perdition is a atmospheric and story-driven 2D Platformer. Set in a metallic wasteland of death and decay, the player takes the role of an android who has "awakened," achieving free thought and self-awareness. Players can explore what remains of the world, choosing whether to obey or disobey the commands of an unforgiving, sadistic god.

name: Pet Mania
summary: A pet simulator for social networks.

name: Persephone Volumes 1 to 3
summary: This version of Persephone is a compilation of Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Volume 1 is an episode of 8 main maps, plus a secret level and a scripted "Cast and Crew" map, whilst Volume 2 is an episode of 10 playable maps and Volume 3 is 14 playable maps. Where necessary for compilation purposes, maps and resources have been tweaked or altered. MAP14 has had a game play overhaul from how it appeared in the Ten Community Project so that the co-op only part of it is also included in the single-player experience. Some minor fixes have been applied to the individual volumes in this compilation process.

name: Peace Park
summary: Peace Park - the game that challenges players to restore peace in a communal park, by understanding visitors' interests and making wise decisions

name: Persona 3 Reload: Aigis Edition
summary:
Persona 3 Reload - Aigis Edition content:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Artbook
• Soundtrack
• Aigis Figure
• Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack (includes all DLC available at launch)

name: Persona 3 Reload: Limited Box
summary:
Persona 3 Reload - Limited Box content:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Artbook
• Soundtrack
• S.E.E.S. uniform armband

name: Persona 3 Reload: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Persona 3 Reload - Digital Deluxe Edition contents:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Digital Artbook
• Digital Soundtrack

name: Persona 3 Reload: Digital Premium Edition
summary:
Persona 3 Reload - Digital Deluxe Edition contents:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Digital Artbook
• Digital Soundtrack
• Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack (includes all DLC available at launch)

name: Penrose
summary:
"A strange thrumming then, not in the air or ears. Sensed dully in a way that I'd never felt before..."

Penrose is a non-linear narrative by doublespeak games. Scroll forwards and backwards through an ever-changing story. Manipulate the environment, explore every possibility, and unravel the mystery at the heart of everything...

name: Petrol Station Sim
summary: Petrol Station Sim is a fun and addictive game that puts you in the shoes of a gas station attendant.

name: Penguru
summary: Penguru is a hack and slash game where you play as an angry Penguen. Choose your weapon from various options. Shoot, blow, cut and rip your way through waves of enemise. Reload and rest at the belly of a whale. As long as you present a Guru Level of Shooting you are welcomed at Penguru universe.

name: Peacemaker: Bloody Emperor
summary: A dark fantasy JRPG. The imperial princess Chrysoberyl must fight the Bloody Emperor who has usurped the throne. However, her army is small and her allies are conniving. It is a bloody war where she will have to choose between peace and lives...

name: Pea Pod Power
summary: Explore a colorful garden world in this unique 3D platformer! An evil alien fungus has invaded the planet and seized control of its crops... use your epic Pea Pod Powers to defeat the fungus and recover the sacred seeds before it’s too late!

name: Persevera
summary: Intoxicated by the philosophy of absurdity of Albert Camus, you wake up malnourished in a torn medical scrub with a suitcase handcuffed to your left arm and thousand open questions. In your pursuit of truth and answers, you encounter various daring quests, technical riddles and hazardous chases.

name: Persha and the Magic Labyrinth: Arabian Nyaights
summary:
Cats and magic take centre stage!?
New experience!? Puzzle battle RPG!!

name: Pew Pew Crew!
summary: Your crew is your currency. Decide carefully which crew members you want to “fire”.

name: Pedro of Brazil
summary: Delve into the epic saga of the Brazilian Empire in "Pedro of Brazil". Master gunfights, swordplay, and hand-to-hand combat. Play as historic figures and immerse yourself in events like the Brazilian Independence and the Paraguayan War. Relive the glory and challenges of an era!

name: Perfect Landing
summary: Rocket towards victory in Perfect Landing, a 2D minimalist speedrun racer. Dodge obstacles, dominate leaderboards, and create your own physics-based levels for an electrifying challenge!

name: Pettson o Findus i Snickarbon
summary: Pettson o Findus i snickarbon is an edutainment game with a collection of mini-games situated in Pettson's workshop. Players will choose a guard for their treasure chest and then will be able to collect gold feathers for every completed activity within the game. Other things can also be collected if found like pieces of a map.

name: Persona 3 Reload: DLC Pack
summary: Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack includes all purchasable additional content.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 2
summary: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 2 contains additional content that allows you to use Personas from Persona 5 Royal.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 1
summary: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Persona Set 1 contains additional content that allows you to use Personas from Persona 5 Royal.

name: Petty's Adventure: Volcano
summary: Petty's Adventure: Volcano is a colorful game with changing gravity in which you have collect crystals to complete a level.

name: Peklo
summary: It is forbidden to leave peklo. point & click graphic adventure made in twine for the Women Gamejam 2022.

name: Perchance to Dream
summary:
You awake after dreaming of a mysterious voice...but where are you?
Let's find out!

name: Perfect Ninja Painter
summary: Perfect Ninja Painter is a colorful arcade puzzle game that's so much fun, it's hard to stop. Paint the walls through 50 levels and try to get all stars!

name: Penguins Luv Melons
summary: The first homebrew game for Nintendo 64.

name: Penky
summary: 1996 Floor painter game.

name: Persona 3 Portable: Grimoire Edition
summary: Persona 3 Portable: Grimoire Edition from Limited Run Games includes the Grimoire Book Box, a Persona 3 Portable Slipcover for the box, a physical copy of Persona 3 Portable for the selected platform and a Steelbook case for the game.

name: Persona 3 Portable: S.E.E.S Edition
summary:
Persona 3 Portable S.E.E.S Edition includes:

- Physical Copy of Persona 3 Portable
- Persona 3 Portable Slipcover
- 1:1 Evoker Replica Shadowbox - Lights Up (Evoker Replica is non-removable)
- All Out Attack 3D Shadow Box
- Persona 3 Portable Official Soundtrack
- Grimoire Book Box
- Character Trading Cards
- School Patch
- S.E.E.S. Armband
- SteelBook
- Certificate of Authenticity - Individually Numbered

name: Pet Shelter Hero
summary: Oh no! Four little pets are missing and their owners are really sad. Play the Pet Shelter Hero and hurry to the rescue! Drive Pet Shelter car and find the lost pets. Be a pet vet and treat pets, shower them and be their pet dentist when you clean their teeth. Return pets to their owners and make them happy again!

name: Penumbra
summary: A vanilla megawad with one new hub for Hexen with 8 new maps.

name: Peace Breaker
summary: Simplistic mecha battling PC game.

name: Pepsi in Sonic the Hedgehog I
summary: In this ROM hack Sonic is replaced for a playable Pepsi Can.

name: Pengo
summary: An unofficial port of Pengo for the Uzebox.

name: Perfect Bird Pitch
summary:
Save chicks with a cute black cat! Guess and identify its parent birds with its voice. All you need is so-called perfect pitch!

The appearance of the chicks is all white and unrecognizable, but they are to chirp in the same pitch as their parent birds.

The black cat felt benevolent toward the chicks that dropped down due to the strong wind and decided to look for its parent birds.

By the time you have done the entire game, you will have developed a nearly absolute pitch sense.

name: Persona 5 Tactica: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Triple Threat Edition includes:

• Base Game
• Limited Edition Bonus - Raoul Picaro
• P5T: Repaint Your Heart Challenge Pack
• P5T: Weapon Pack
• P5T: Picaro Summoning Pack

name: Persona 5 Tactica: Picaro Summoning Pack + Raoul Persona
Persona 5 Tactica: Repaint Your Heart Challenge Pack
summary:
Rise up and take on a new test with the Repaint Your Heart Challenge Pack! Features new game rules, two additional characters, and new battles with dynamic stages.

P5T Repaint Your Heart Challenge Pack includes:
- Access to Goro and Kasumi
- All-new details in the Report information within the main game
- Unlocks brutal Challenge Stages with exclusive clear conditions
- Adds unique unit formations to subsequent playthroughs

name: Pellet Packer: Micro Munch
summary: Chomp your way up the ranks in "Pellet Packer: Micro Munch"! A chaotic strategy survival game where everything- including your own control method- is your enemy.

name: Pellet Packer: Cookie Crunch
summary: Crunch your way around fun, colourful worlds in "Pellet Packer: Cookie Crunch"!

name: Penguin World
summary: Penguin World is a delisted Facebook game released in 2010 based around penguins. The gameplay has been described as a combination of Treasure Isle and Club Penguin, where you play minigames, gain coins and buy items to decorate your world with.

name: Penile Devastation
summary: Medium-sized detailed Metal map.

name: Persona Collection
summary: Experience the power of Persona today!

name: Perfect Dark PC Port
summary: An unofficial port of the N64 game Perfect Dark to PC using a decompilation of that game.

name: Perish the Thoth
summary: Large underground Egyptian vault.

name: Perception
summary: Medium sized Egypt-style temple in a canyon.

name: Petey Pedro Unbeetable Adventure
summary: A nostalgic game for those RAD 80's and 90's kids. Help Petey Pedro get back home after falling into a magical world where the sweets he chose over a healthy beet are now his worst nightmare.

name: Pestilence
summary: Pestilence is a first-person stealth game in which you play as the Lord of the Pestilence, a betrayed God who seeks revenge against his brothers. Make use of your uncanny abilities to infiltrate this Spanish inspired city and infect their leaders.

name: Peepo Hop!
summary: Guide Peepo to the top of the mountain in this precision platformer. Charge each of his legs to determine his jump trajectory, but be careful any mistake will send Peepo falling back down.

name: Penguin Hatchery
summary: Penguin Hatchery is a game about hatching penguins. Yeah thats pretty much it. With the help of some clicking and some random things that sometimes make sense sometimes don't you can begin to hatch penguin eggs and eventually hatch them at an insane rate!

name: Perdition
summary: DOOM: Perdition is a spiritual successor to Thy Flesh Consumed. At the end of your last crusade to Hell, the hideous wreck of the Spiderdemon leaves behind a gateway. Passing through it, you emerge in the green fields of Earth -- only to find that everything is not as it should be ...

name: Persona 4: Golden Grimoire Edition
summary:
Persona 4: Golden Grimoire Edition includes:

Physical Copy of Persona 4 Golden
Persona 4 Golden Slipcover
Grimoire Book Box
SteelBook

name: Persona 4: Golden Midnight Channel Edition
summary:
Persona 4: Golden Midnight Channel Edition includes:

Physical Copy of Persona 4 Golden for PlayStation 4
Lenticular Midnight Channel Box
Persona 4 Golden Slipcover
Grimoire Book Box
Persona 4 Golden Official Soundtrack
Premium Trading Card Set
Yu Naurkami's Glasses and Display Stand
All Out Attack 3D Shadow Box
Metal Teddie Statuette
SteelBook
Persona 4 Golden Ending Photo
Midnight Channel Pin
Individually Numbered Certificate of Authenticity

name: Petrin
summary: Inspired by the Petřín hill in Prague, you enter a viewing tower full of alien scum.

name: Pew Pew Squad
summary: In Pew Pew Squad, battle zombies in a post-apocalyptic setting. Take out the undead, buy new weapons, and up your odds of survival. Fast-paced action and constant challenges await you in this thrilling game!

name: Pebble Jame
summary: A merging puzzle game inspired by a certain game with watermelons. Merge pebbles together in multiple different game modes and see how high of a score you can get!

name: Peggy's Farm
summary: Combine the cozy crafting of a farming sim with the satisfying physics of a pachinko game, and what do you get? Peggy's Farm!

name: Peppa Pig: Read and Play with Peppa
summary: Read & play with Peppa Pig! Help Peppa and George play entertaining games as they tidy up the house together! You can also read about Peppa's fancy dress party and find out who wins the prize for the best outfit!

name: Perfect Heist 2: Historic Characters DLC
summary: Plan your heist with 6 brand-new historic characters! Perfect your robber strategy with Einstein, Al Capone, and Karl Marx. Or try to catch the robbers with Marie Curie, Caesar, and Queen Elizabeth I.

name: Perseus
summary: Traverse dungeons and slay beasts in order to get closer to your goal: Medusa.

name: Petualangan DivineKids
summary:
Adventure RPG game of Abe, Bambo, Cici against the dark witch Indra who will resurrect the 1000 year old Demon. Interesting story, exciting battles, animated with Indonesian language, fun to play.

The Divinekids Adventure was the first Indonesian game to be awarded the MURI award in 2004.

name: Peaky Blinders: The King's Ransom - Complete Edition
summary: Prove you have what it takes to join the Peaky Blinders in The King's Ransom, a narrative VR game inspired by the epic gangster drama. Complete with all DLC included – including 7 additional missions and challenges!

name: Peaceland
summary: Point-and-click game distributed by BNN, based on the original work by picture book writer Jun Takabatake. Each scene in the game unfolds like a narrated storybook, with clickable elements for new animations and music.

name: Pelagos: A Marine Adventure
summary: Dive into Pelagos: Snap, Learn & Explore Marine Ecosystems!

name: Penduline Village
summary: Penduline Village allows you to impersonate a witch moving in on her own island. She can then use her ability to cook and brew potions in order to help the villagers with the quests they offer, and get appreciated in the village.

name: Pen Pals
summary: Things are going HAYwire down at the farm! Corral a herd of particularly round barnyard friends back into the pen. When two matching animals bump into each other, you'll find an even larger animal in their place. Things get crowded quickly, so do your best in Pen Pals!

name: Pestersim
summary: The complete MSPA Reader Saga in one bundle - Hiveswap Friendsim and Pesterquest

name: Peach is Missing
summary: A romhack for Super Mario World with 77 exits

name: Peanut's Journey
summary: Embark on "Peanut's Journey" as Mr. Peanut! In this mild roguelike tower climb, face diverse challenges and the unknown. Can you strategically navigate each level and uncover Mr. Peanut's destiny?

name: Persona 5 Tactica: DLC All in One
summary:
The All In One DLC Pack includes the following:

• Repaint Your Heart Challenge Pack
• Weapon Pack
• Picaro Summoning Pack + Raoul Persona

name: Peasant Royale
summary: Meet the first standalone medieval battle royale game! Take part in battles with up to 50 players using a wide variety of weapons and other items.

name: PentaZorg
summary: PentaZorg is an intense arcade bullet hell that is quite difficult to describe in a single sentence.

name: Peeking at the peak
summary: ”Peeking at the Peak" is a challenging high difficulty mountain climbing game. Control the fun melon to overcome dangerous mountains and difficult obstacles. This unique mountain climbing game requires precise control. Test your skills on demanding courses and reach the top!

name: Perfect Cells Project
summary: You are a pink life form. The target is utilizing the evolved abilities to seek revenge on the researchers while progressively breaking through barriers toward the exit.

name: Penny Blood: Hellbound
summary: Unleash the hounds from hell and fight your way free of this otherworldly prison in a roguelike adventure that explores the world of Penny Blood’s darker side! Can you find the distinction between good and evil…?

name: Pet Rock Duty
summary: Ever tried to escape a twisted pocket dimension school building with the exit heavily barricaded while trying to keep a hungry pet rock flesh spider named Bobby content so it doesn't break out of its tank and eat you alive? No? Lord, what are they teaching in school these days?

name: Pets & Stuff
summary:
Immerse yourself into the role of a pet groomer at a cute pet clinic. Help adorable, furry friends with all kinds of different treatments. Let your imagination run wild and impress not only your fuzzy customers, but everyone around with a completely renewed, colourful and healthy look. Everyone deserves to be happy, groomed and in style!
Cuteness overload and fur everywhere guaranteed!

name: Pee Pee Bon Bon: Qusumi Masayuki No Appare Characters 100
Pesterquest Rewritten
summary: A fanmade rewrite of Homestuck - Pesterquest!

name: Perfect Chess
summary: Chess Designed Specially for GAMERS! Integrated with the XZ Tutorial, which teaches you everything to play a competitive and successful game Have a LESS Boring and More Dynamic and Competitive Game Awaken the "Grand Master" in you today!

name: Pedal Rebel VR
summary: Pedal Rebel VR is a adrenaline-pumping cyberpunk motorbike street racing game that completely transforms any exercise bike and any VR headset into an immersive racing experience!

name: Pebble Beach no Hatou Plus
summary: Pebble Beach no Hatou Plus is the sequel to the Megadrive game Pebble Beach no Hatou that was released in 1994. Enjoy the 3D golf course set in a prestigious West Coast surrounded by the natural beauty. Pebble Beach is widely regarded as one of the most beautiful courses in the world. It hugs the rugged coastline and has wide open views of the ocean. 3D is a beautiful and faithful reproduction of the Pebble Beach golf course layout and graphic art.

name: Penetration
summary: The mod story does not consider events in Half-Life 2:Episode 1. After explosion of citadel, G-man immerses Gordon Freeman in stasis, but after a while deduces it from there for the new mission. The target of this mission is penetration into a citadel which is in City 18 (the city located near to City 17). In this citadel there is a teleport in Combine world. Using this teleport, it is necessary to get in Combine World and to destroy their leader.

name: Pernalonga
summary: A handheld game based on Bugs Bunny.

name: Pegged
summary: Pegged is a puzzle video game developed by Mike Blaylock and published by Microsoft in their Microsoft Entertainment Pack for Windows for Windows 3 in 1990. It is a video game version of various layouts of peg solitaire.

name: Perished World Merchant
summary: You play as Red "the Merchant" Hunter, who has to explore a desolate world looking for supplies to use and sell to travelers so that they can follow their journeys and complete their quests. Every trade that you lose means that the chances of that buyer coming back are low. So is up to you to find what they want and to sell at whatever price you want.

name: Peek-A-Boo
summary: Since Peek-A-Boo was intended for very young children the gameplay is very simple. The main character of this game (a cat named Smart Seymour) moves in and out from behind a square. Depending on the game selected the various elements of the game change slightly. The square may be a single block, a rectangle, or four colored squares. The cat may move far away from the square, or he may barely move half his body out. The cat may move rapidly in and out from behind the square, or he may stay behind the square. There are eight different types of games, each with a slightly different objective.

name: Perfect Dark With Mario Characters
summary: A mod for Perfect Dark replaces all of the characters with ones from the Mario universe along with a variety of changes & improvements. For example multiple guards are now female with new outfits for different levels along with the unused Hat mechanic now being utilized with new hat models that guards can wear. While the level layouts & objectives are the same as the original game, some have gotten some noteworthy changes that will throw off experts.

name: Petit Game Collection Vol.1
summary: A spin-off minigame collection of "Needy Streamer Overload". Meet your internet angel in this retro-style game world! In Volume 1, we are featuring 3 mini-games that receive inspiration from good old retro bishōjo games! A retro-style visual novel where you get to experience a rare date scene that can't be seen in the main game. Take Ame to a nice place and give her the time of her life!

name: Peeping Tom
summary: First you only see a window with four closed blinds. Behind the blinds enemy spacecraft move about and shoot at you. If you hit one of the enemies behind the blinds by pure chance the blind will open.

name: People's World
summary: I really wish they would just fight without me. Turn-based adventure RPG

name: Perdita
summary: Perdita is an atmospheric story rich first person horror game, with focus on dynamic paranormal events, as well as traditional investigation methods. You are investigating the legend of voodoo witch Julia Brown and her husband at their old house at Manchac Swamps, Louisiana. the year is 1989. 20 years ago Julia died cursing the whole town, after her death, three hurricanes hit the area. Leaving death and destruction behind.

name: Perfect Poses
summary: Adjust your pose, go through the hole!

name: Perfect Castle
summary: Dive into the world of castles and puzzles with 'Perfect Castle' – a meditative game where every choice you make shapes a unique fortress. It's the ideal choice for those who prefer relaxing games and puzzles, allowing you to fully enjoy the process of creating and enhancing your own stronghold

name: Petit Petit Petit: Nightmare Pack
summary: For "Petit Petit Petit", downloadable contents 1 additional stage (STAGE-4: Brain Stage) Additional character x 3 types Petapeta Kamii Mr. P This pack includes the following downloadable contents

name: Pendant
summary: Uncover the secrets of an ancient land while you talk with gods, enhance your magical capabilities, and take down monsters and demons.

name: Pepa's Adventure
summary: Pepa's Adventure: a papercut point-and-click book. The characters and backgrounds are crafted from handmade papercut art. Pepa, a paper fairy girl, lived with book fairy Lex. One day, scissor fairy Slash cut and stole his pages. Pepa embarks on an adventure to recover stolen pages.

name: Pets and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Perfect Date
summary: Perfect Date is a dating simulator where you will have the chance to prove that you can seduce some of the best-looking girls that you have ever met.

name: Pentaball
summary: An action packed polygon physics based Basketball game! Fun alone, and with friends!!!

name: Pencil Fantastic
summary: This is currently just an art game, you create single line drawings by controlling a pencil from the third person. Levels, collectible items and even shooter elements are all in development so stick around!

name: Pepe Chatters
summary: Pepe Chatters is an exciting game in which the player has to help the cute frog Pepe solve riddles and puzzles to save his friends from the clutches of an evil sorcerer. With the help of clever jokes and a vivid sense of humor, Pepe will explore different levels, meet interesting characters and collect unique items to solve problems. Immerse yourself in Pepe's magical world and help him bring peace and tranquility back to his home!

name: Penguin
summary: Penguin is a Chinese exclusive penguin-theme racing game released in 2004 for the Timetop GameKing.

name: Pet Run/Stop
summary: Tiny petscii arcadey shooty

name: Persona 3 Escape
summary: Persona 3 Escape is a Persona 3 spin-off developed for Japanese mobile phones. The game takes place during the love hotel scene on the third full moon.

name: Petit Petit Petit: Specter Pack
summary: For "Petit Petit Petit", downloadable contents 1 additional stage (STAGE-5) Additional character x 3 types Roka Beans Melt Mikko This pack includes the following downloadable contents

name: Persona 3 Broken Shadow
summary: Persona 3 Broken Shadow is a Persona 3-themed version of the classic arcade game Breakout. In Broken Shadow, there are three difficulty levels and ten stages for each of them. By destroying the shadow blocks, players gain more power and special card effects for hitting certain targets. By clearing stages, players gain mobile phone wallpapers.

name: Persona 3 Illust Puzzle
summary: Persona 3 Illust Puzzle is a nonogram-style puzzle game. Like traditional nonograms, cells in a grid must be filled in in order to correctly reveal the image. The puzzles in this game are primarily tied to the Arcana motif of the Persona series with a total of forty puzzles, in color and monochrome difficulty levels. By completing puzzles, players fill out the game's gallery.

name: Per Aspera Test
summary: Survive an intense 5-minute challenge in Per Aspera Test, a nostalgic horror game reminiscent of the PlayStation 1 era. Run, decide, and confront stressful challenges. Run, breathe, think fast - can you handle it? Share results with friends and find out who's the best!

name: Persona 3 Reload: Velvet Costume & BGM Set
summary: Persona 3 Reload: Velvet Room Costume and BGM Set contains additional content that allows you to use exclusive Velvet Room themed costumes and listen to 5 BGM tracks.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden EX BGM Set
summary:
Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden EX BGM Set is exclusive to the Persona 3 Reload: Expansion Pass and contains additional content that allows you to listen to background music from Persona 4 Golden.

Tracks include the dungeon BGMs: "Backside of the TV", "Game", "Junes Theme", "Heaven" and "Long Way" along with the battle BGMs "Revelations: Mitsuo", "The Almighty" and "Results."

Results will automatically be applied as the battle result theme when you set one of the tracks in this pack as your battle BGM. It cannot be applied individually.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal EX BGM Set
summary:
Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal EX BGM Set is exclusive to the Persona 3 Reload: Expansion Pass and contains additional content that allows you to listen to background music from Persona 5 Royal.

Tracks include the dungeon BGMs "Life Will Change", "Beneath the Mask", "Kichijoji 199X", "Gentle Madman" and "I believe" along with the battle BGMs "Keeper of Lust", "Blooming Villain" and "Victory."

Victory will automatically be applied as the battle result theme when you set one of the tracks in this pack as your battle BGM. It cannot be applied individually.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Episode Aigis
summary:
After unravelling the mysteries of the Dark Hour, fighting epic battles through Tartarus, and all the unforgettable events of Persona 3 Reload, the S.E.E.S. members find themselves trapped in a never-ending March 31st.

When an unfamiliar android, Metis, suddenly appears at the dorm along with the mysterious "Abyss of Time", the team works together to uncover the cause of this strange fate..

name: Persona 3 Reload: Expansion Pass
summary: Dive deeper into the world of Persona 3 Reload with this expansion pass featuring new costumes, BGM, and extended story content Episode Aigis -The Answer-.

name: Permaban
summary:
We went too far.

Twelfth in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: Perdition's Flames
summary: The afterlife isn't what you expected. Explore a strangely modernized and bureaucratic underworld, replete with strip malls, government offices, and science labs, as well as the occasional lake of molten rock.

name: Peppermint Falls
summary: Peppermint Falls is a farming simulator set in an enchanting world of sweets. Cultivate delightful candy plants, explore the world with your whimsical pancake house companion, forge friendships with charming confectionary inhabitants, and discover fabled mysteries!

name: PETSCII Bros
summary: This Commodore PET game has similar game mechanics to the original Mario Bros arcade game. Hit the floor under the turtles to flip them, and jump up to kick them. A one or two player action game made for the TOJam 2023 game jam.

name: PETSCII Raiders
summary: Based on the classic space invaders game. Destroy all raiders while avoiding guided projectiles from the mother ship at the top of the screen

name: PET Panic!
summary: The arcade game Space Panic was the first "platformer" game, and it inspired more popular games of the time such as Lode Runner and Donkey Kong. There were many different versions of Space Panic on the original 8-bit machines, including Apple Panic which won a number of game awards. This is an updated version for the Commodore PET.

name: Perfect Ninja Painter 2
summary: This ninja master is back in action and this time he's bringing a friend along.

name: Pepper
summary: Dive into 'Pepper,' a mesmerizing souls-like RPG where monsters roam and mysteries await. Engage in branching dialogue, crafting your destiny with every decision. Explore diverse endings in this captivating fantasy world. Are you prepared to shape your legend in 'Pepper'?

name: Petris
summary: A new, simple and easy puzzle game you can play forever has finally arrived. It is called Petris.Rotate the shapes, move them right or left and try to create as many lines as you can.Colorful, relaxing game. Playing Petris may improve your cognitive skills.

name: Perfect Dark Zero
summary: What was originally intended to be a launch title for the GameCube, but Microsoft buyout of Rare resulted in the game’s development being moved to the Xbox, but in the end it became a launch title for the Xbox 360.

name: Pew Pew vs. Monsters
summary: Pew Pew vs Monsters is an action-packed arena shooter with roguelike elements. Play as a seasoned monster slayer, blast your way through hordes of fast enemies and improve your skills in order to confront the mother of all monsters.

name: Pencilvania
summary: Pencilvania is a game of exploration and solving secrets, where Pena - the main character - has set itself to make its dream become true: launch its own wings at the sky and fierce through the winds. But for that, you must collect feathers and bring them to the Great Magic Topper.

name: Petit Petit Petit: DLC 2 - Specter Pack
Personal Finance Simulator
summary: Choose how much money you start with, a profession, and a city, then make personal financial decisions! Will you end up rich or end up getting evicted?

name: Penalty
summary: Penalty is a 2D Openworld adventure RPG, with unique gameplay mechanics, FBF animations, and beautiful sound and visual effects. Fight your way through with zour weapons and with zour magic, you can use to customize your hero with armor and weapons.

name: Permanent Mark
summary: This is a zombie style tower defense game that is easy to learn and suitable for all ages.

name: PegIdle
summary: PegIdle is a peggle idle game! Destroy thousands of pegs by dropping thousands of balls. Purchase auto drop which will drop balls for you! Score points by hitting pegs, clearing the board and being dropped into the pit!

name: Pet Grooming Studio
summary: Sponge, brush and blow-dry them until they gleam!

name: Permanent: Hope & Vacuum
summary: Psychological horror, puzzles, platforming, adventure, dungeons, action, intrigue and a touching story are all terms that should be used to try to define the essence of «Permanent: Hope & Vacuum».

name: Peaches and Dreams
summary: A turn-based rpg about overcoming emotional abuse and the monsters that find homes in your mind.

name: Peggle 2: Windy the Fairy Master Pack
summary: Peggle 2 has become more masterly, thanks to the addition of a sparkling new Peggle Master – Windy the Fairy! This impish little sprite wants nothing more than to enable huge scores with the help of her incredible Fairy Flock power, which magically transforms lowly blue pegs into ferociously high-scoring purple pegs. With Fairy Flock even the simplest shots become Free Ball-earning monsters, and great shots become titanic monuments to the acquisition of points. Containing 10 new levels, 10 new trials, 30 additional objectives, 3 costumes and 3 new achievements, Windy’s Master Pack is a Peggler's dream!

name: Peerless Destiny
summary: "Peerless Destiny" is a fantasy 3DARPG, with exaggerated and cool fight, rich plots, and full dubbing of all game characters and creatures!

name: Peas! Animated Sudoku
summary: In PEAS! Animated Sudoku, dive into a logic challenge where you fill in the rows and columns with adorable animated peas, each with their own distinct emotion and behavior.

name: Penguin Migrants
summary: Puzzle game of penguins (homebrew for GB and MegaDuck)

name: Pearl Fishery: Quest for the Mega Pearl
summary: Shoot pearls, fire harpoons, and collect treasure under the mysterious "Pearl Island" in this new single-player, ocean-themed coin pusher game!

name: Peach Hills Division
summary: An erotic point-and-click adventure game blending paranormal fantasy with military intrigue. Woo your squadmates, collect clues, and uncover the secrets of the Peach Hills Division!

name: Penta Terra
summary: An enchanting fantasy colony simulator where the world comes alive through intricate simulation.

name: Pepita Viajera Arctic
summary: Pepita Viajera travels and lands in the Arctic and needs to recover the pieces of her plane. Help her recover the pieces by properly answering the questions that will be asked and avoiding multiple obstacles in this educational platform game.

name: Pest Apocalypse
summary: Post-Apocalyptic pizza delivery survival on wheels! Assemble a team of heavily armed survivors, smash through buildings and pull off ridiculous nitro-boosted stunts - whatever it takes to plow through the horde and feed the wasteland!

name: Perfect Knife
summary: Can you throw the perfect knife?

name: Pegasis
summary: Joust clone

name: Perimeter: Legate Edition
summary: Perimeter is a real-time strategy game with a destructible world. Utilize the environment for resource gathering and defense against enemies. Immerse yourself in the millennia-spanning history of the Chains of Worlds and lead a faction in the struggle for survival.

name: Perfect Performer: The Yellow Monkey
summary: Perfect Performer: The Yellow Monkey is a Music/Rhythm video game featuring The Yellow Monkey, a Japanese Rock Band, formed by Kazuya Yoshii aka Lovin (Vocals), Hirose Youichi aka Heesey (Bass), Hideaki Kikuchi aka Emma (Guitar), Eiji Kikuchi aka Annie (Drums).

name: Petty Officer
summary: You are a Compliance Officer for SPACEFLEET. Search for clues on your Compliance Console. Open your dossier to assemble your investigation, check your work, and bring Captain Braxton to justice. Click and Drag until the truth is revealed.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden Yasogami High Costume Set
Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Shujin Academy Costume Set
Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal BGM Set
Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Phantom Thieves Costume Set
summary: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 5 Royal Phantom Thieves Costume Set contains additional content that allows you to use Phantom Thieves costumes from Persona 5 Royal.

name: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden Persona Set
summary: Persona 3 Reload: Persona 4 Golden Persona Set contains additional content that allows you to use Personas from Persona 4 Golden.

name: Pelican Harbor
summary: Dive into a cozy village-building adventure with friends, reminiscent of Animal Crossing.
