Customize your Pelican, Home-Isle, and Harbor, then sail to diverse isles to harvest resources and fish. Sell your catch to NPCs, and attract specific ones to stay. Test your Rythm-Game skills by harvesting...

name: Penguin Helper
summary: Penguin Helper is your chance to go to the South Pole, become a hero for penguins and enjoy a peaceful atmosphere.

name: Permafrost
summary: Embark on a brutal journey of survival in a perpetual winter. Hunt and gather resources for building and utilize deep survival mechanics to craft your way through a harsh, unforgiving landscape. Forge alliances or dominate the remnants of humanity in this chilling open world saga.

name: Pegglo
summary: Join Pegglo, the hedgehog hero, in this Peggle-like game with a roguelike twist! Tackle a series of unique levels, master critical hits, and choose powerful upgrades. Every game is a new adventure!

name: Pet Cemetery
summary: In the quiet woods of Illinois, a regular guy's peaceful country life takes a sinister turn after an accidental death sets off a bizarre chain of events. As he navigates the mysterious consequences, the secrets of the woods slowly unravel, revealing an eerie connection between lives. Brace yourself for a journey into the heart of rural Illinois, where a single mistake leads to a chilling and enigmatic tale that blurs the line between life and death.

name: Perika Game
summary:
Perika Game is a puzzle and collectibles game where your ingenuity will be your est ally. Will you be able to overcome the challenge and get all the fruits?

Inspired (obviously) by Suika Game, this project arose for the IlloJam convened mainly for members of the community of the well-known spanish-speaking streamer IlloJuan.

name: Perfect World
summary: Perfect World is an anti-capitalist art platformer. It is an environmentalist parable that subverts player incentivization and proposes that a sustainable future exists if we declare “I have enough.” It is a hallucination, a dream, a nightmare.

name: Pelago
summary: Pelago is a creature-catching adventure game! Explore the islands of Pelago and befriend the creatures that live there. Build your perfect team to overcome any challenge and unravel the mysteries of the islands.

name: Permanence Break
summary: A sci-fi first-person puzzle game based around object permanence. Move and look around rooms in order to pick which objects you see and which you don't.

name: Perfect Love
summary: A horror-romance visual novel where you shape Milo Change, a student in one of the classes that you attend, into your desired, Perfect Love.

name: Perfect Apocalypse: The Day After
summary: This is the PA series final Fan-game.

name: Persist Online
summary: Persist Online is an MMORPG with zombies, so you better get yourself a gun. Survive in an unforgiving open world, where every building is accessible. Forge a deadly team with friends and claim what's not yours. Take your loot to your safe bunker to craft better gear. Some survive. The best persist!

name: Penguin's Road
summary: Penguin's Road is a fast and fun 3rd-person action shooter. The player is given an arsenal of weapons and tools to defeat enemies that attack from the land, the sea and the air. The game rewards improvisation: run-and-gun, cover-to-cover, long aim, short blast, hand-to-hand or commandeering tanks!

name: Petal Runner
summary: Hop on your bike and join Cali & Kira as they explore the sun-soaked city of Sapphire Valley and train to become Petal Runners! Make deliveries, meet new friends, play minigames, and discover a wholesome slice-of-life story about growing up and letting go.

name: Penguin Take-Off!!
summary: A penguin races through the ice for its family. Sometimes sliding, sometimes flying, it overcomes numerous challenges. "Penguin Take-Off!!" is a side-scrolling sliding action game. Despite its catchy graphics, players will experience a tension where not a single mistake is permitted.

name: Pense Bem: Ciência e corpo humano
Pense Bem
summary: Master System port of Pense Bem, which itself was based on a toyline by Tec Toy. It is an educational quiz game and usually is considered as a bundle 10 different games.

name: Pennon and Battle
summary: "Pennon and Battle" is a turn-based strategy war game. As a lord, you will play a crucial role in the revival of the kingdom! Lead heroes and armies to expand territory in Ruachland, utilize tactics and magic to eliminate enemy forces, and create your own legend!

name: Persnippety
summary: Never lose a clipboard snippet again. Easily copy, paste, and sync text and images from your clipboard.

name: Peter's Journey
summary: Embark on a journey of this text anime quest with RPG elements! Walk through beautiful locations, overcome challenges and make Peter’s dreams come true. Every step you take matters. And don’t forget to take the diary - you’ll need it!

name: Pedro Temple
summary: An action arcade platformer!

name: Peer to Peer
summary:
Your choices define who you are. But what if you don't make them consciously?

Peer To Peer is a short first-person social experiment where the player gets to experience situations where they'll have to pick which scenario they want to unfold. There is no traditional win-or-lose situation here, the player leaves with a newfound sense of their own personal behaviour.

name: Penultima
summary: Mecha Anime Rivalry.

name: Penumbra Lane
summary: Penumbra Lane is a point-and-click adventure horror game in which you play as a depressed cat-man named Xavier, who is attempting to break the lease for his new apartment.

name: PeakPals
summary: PeakPals offers a multiplayer game where players strive to reach the top, either alone or with friends. The game involves overcoming obstacles, solving puzzles, enduring falls, and engaging in playful acts of sabotage, like throwing grenades at teammates' feet.

name: Peacely Online
summary:
Embark on an epic adventure in Peacely Online, a captivating 2D top-down pixel art MMORPG. Enter the peaceful world of Peacely, a realm without ego,

Explore diverse maps, complete thrilling quests, and battle fearsome monsters to progress through the game. Collect gear and items from loot drops and customize your character.

Start your journey in Peacely Ville, where you have a cozy home to return to and numerous NPCs to interact with. Alongside loyal pets that aid in your battles and a vibrant community of players to chat with, Peacely Online promises an immersive and enjoyable gaming experience.

name: Persona 4 GB
summary:
EXPERIENCE THE HIT CLASSIC JRPG SERIES NOW ON THE GAMEBOY!

Ever wonder what Persona 4 would look like if it was released on the gameboy? Well now you don't need to, as a reimagining of what a gameboy Persona 4 might be like comes to reality and on actual hardware with a rom file.

name: PetVille
summary: PetVille is a game where you raise, dress, and care for a pet that you create. Visit your friends' houses and play with their pets to earn coins you can use to make your pet and house the coolest on the block!

name: Peasant
summary: Explore a beautiful medieval fantasy open world and defend your base against the so-called-heroes in this single player 3rd-person action RPG. Your choices create a dynamic experience in every playthrough!

name: Peachy Derby
summary: This is a casual racing game where the girl Natsuki is forced to join the "Ninja Racing Tournament" to pay off her debt. Include 10 playable girls, 100 dances, 600 Japanese voices, 16 story chapters, and outerwear destruction system.

name: Pet Crossing
summary: A cruiser came to a blue planet and found a planet with many ice-blocked caves, which contained frozen animals that were sent in before the catastrophe. Only paired animals could survive after thawing. The expedition team needs your wisdom to help match these animals and restore life to the planet.

name: Penny Dell Sudoku
summary: The right time to play some sudoku is all the time. Have somewhere to be? Save your progress locally so you can finish the puzzle later. Come back every day for a fresh new Sudoku puzzle!

name: PeraPera Mountain
summary: Hack and slash your way to the top of PERAPERA Mountain while you learn Japanese. Cast spells, acquire new abilities, build synergies and level up your Japanese skills in each unique run.

name: Persecution: The Elevator
summary: Persecution - The Elevator is a first-person psychological thriller. Explore an ordinary apartment in a new building, where one night strange things begin to happen.

name: Penalty Challenge
summary: Embark on an exhilarating journey with Penalty Challenge, the definitive 11-meter shot simulator crafted for those passionate about elevating their football abilities.

name: Penguin Panic!
summary: A penguin's life is never easy. Even more so when you're a penguin mother, looking to protect her eggs. Penguin Panic is a cute platformer and features simple controls, secret challenges and cheerful graphics. A fast-paced action game that no one will want to put down.

name: Peech World
summary: An action - packed turn based bullet hell RPG. Explore and save a vibrant world!

name: Pen to Paper
summary: A visual novel journaling game hybrid about charting a traveller's journey.

name: Peacequarium
summary: An idle aquarium simulator you can resize and keep anywhere on your screen while you do other things. Buy, feed, and grow your fish to earn money. Buy cool upgrades and complete your collection of rare, epic and legendary fish!

name: Peach Clicker
summary: You've clicked on so many bananas, but have you clicked on peaches? In Peach Clicker you smack a Peach to get even more Peaches! Every hour, you get a new peach! Come smack some peaches with us!

name: Penguin: Sokoban Adventure
summary:
Help the Penguin collect all the bones and find the way to the igloo.

Penguin: Sokoban Adventure is a puzzle game for the NES. The game was created using Retro Puzzle Maker.

The game contains 64 levels of varying difficulty.

name: Peach
summary: In this world, simply being near or gently tapping one of my peaches ensures a fresh delivery to your Steam Inventory every 30 minutes. Embrace this future, and taste the excellence of natures blessing.

name: Perish
summary: This game is a space shooter where players assume the role of a simulated fighter pilot battling enemy ships in the vastness of space.

name: Perfect Match
summary: Perfect Match, Book 1 is the first book of the Perfect Match series. It is followed by Perfect Match, Book 2.

name: Perfect Match 2
summary: Perfect Match, Book 2 is the second and final book of the Perfect Match series. It succeeds its first book, Perfect Match, Book 1.

name: Pet Lands
summary: Collect quadrillion of coins, hatch pets to mine for you, and unlock 100 unique hand-crafted areas! An incremental clicker/idle creatures-collection adventure. Dopamine heaven has arrived!

name: Persona 3 Portable: Kotone Cutscenes Project - Steam Version
summary: The Kotone Cutscenes Project implements reanimated versions of every cutscene from the original PS2 release of Persona 3 to match the Female protagonist route of Persona 3 Portable. This includes alternative versions of scenes for choices exclusive to this route (eg. Theodore or Elizabeth).

name: Persona 3 Portable: Kotone Cutscenes Project - PSP Version
summary: The Kotone Cutscenes Project implements reanimated versions of every cutscene from the original PS2 release of Persona 3 to match the Female protagonist route of Persona 3 Portable. This includes alternative versions of scenes for choices exclusive to this route (eg. Theodore or Elizabeth).

name: Pearl Rising
summary:
You play as Pearl, a young cadet, woken up when your city is under attack by the Bugs. Your job is to secure the area and find out what's going on!
The only good bug is a dead bug, they say.

name: Pedro
summary: A cool clicker.

name: Pets
summary: The gaming universe "Pets" is already waiting for you - new active players! Our game is created for all animal lovers and, of course, for those who already have their own favorite pets! Just click and get various pets into your inventory - from cats and dogs to turtles and hamsters!

name: Peg Solitaire
summary: Solve the puzzle one peg at a time.

name: PelPet
summary: PelPet climbs down a ladder. Players can add or remove the crossbars to change PelPet's direction. As PelPet goes down and down, he becomes faster and faster; collect items to help manage your journey and avoid obstacles.

name: Peter's Adventures in English
summary: Take control of Peter as he travels across the kingdom, solving puzzles, making friends and defeating monsters. This game is designed to be accessible to a very broad range of players, including young children and people learning English as a second language.

name: Pepsi Nex Game
summary: A promotional Flash auto-runner where you must smash walls of ice with well-timed punches.

name: Penn Guiny
summary: After being sucked into a sack full of dreams Penn Guiny lands into an area of the dream realm called "Sunny Shores". With the help of an unnamed cloud lady Penn Guiny learns how to traverse the dream realm.

name: Penelope Pendrick and the Art of Deceit
summary: Pick up your magnifying glass as writer-turned-detective Penelope Pendrick in this first-person point and click mystery adventure! Three people have suddenly vanished from the sleepy town of Carlisle. Follow the clues, interrogate suspects, and solve puzzles to end this case - before it ends you.

name: Persephone
summary: Persephone is a dream-inspired, unique approach to first-person survival horror. With no weapons to attack, you'll need to utilize your environment in order to survive. When your surroundings won't save you in some scenarios, the only option is to run and redirect the threat.

name: Petrichor
summary: PETRICHOR is inspired by the frantic, explosive gameplay of shoot-em-ups and run-n-guns from the 80s and 90s combined with a sense of sprawling adventure and exploration. You take on the role of The Spaceman, a mercenary sellship on a quest to discover the mysteries of the dread moon Petrichor. You will face hoards of possessed robots and hostile wildlife as you navigate six levels toward the moon's core where you must defeat the haunted supercomputer that controls the ruined alien facility built here thousands of years ago.

name: Pet Kawaii Shop
summary: Create the cutest pet paradise and win customers’ hearts!

name: Periculum
summary: Periculum is a casual strategy game about conquering hexagonal tiles. Engage in battles against up to 7 bots or challenge your friends to see who comes out on top. With plenty of different game modes and options.

name: Penguin Detectives: Crash Patrol
summary: In this visual novel, a group of penguins embark on an adventure on the ice, making friends and solving challenges.

name: Petrified Pawns
summary: Petrified Pawns has chess-style movement and turn-based combat. Fight new types of chess pieces and bosses. Build your army and keep them alive while you advance through the dungeon. Use healing spells, loot and strategy to keep your king alive and to reach the end with as many units as possible.

name: Persona 4 Dancing All Night: Heaven featuring Hatsune Miku
summary: DLC for Persona 4 Dancing All Night which allows the player to play a special versione of Heaven with Hatsune Miku as a dancer.

name: Pet Cam
summary: Arya living a peaceful life by day, but each night, an eerie phone call from her father haunts her sleep. One night, the call turns into a nightmare, unraveling a terrifying story about her past. Can you uncover the truth before it consumes you?

name: Perfect Klondike Solitaire
summary: Prepare to test your strategic solitaire abilities!

name: Pepe's Revenge
summary: A sci-fi themed FPS (Frog and Pepe Shooter). Wave after wave of amphibian-based mayhem. Choose your weapon and put those stinkin' frogs in their place. Git Gud, scrub

name: Perk Park Paradise
summary: As aspiring baristas, unravel the shop's secrets through immersive puzzles and interactive props. Navigate and master coffee-themed challenges in stunning environments. Are you ready to brew up excitement and unlock the secrets of Brew Haven?

name: Pelagicland
summary: Pelagicland is a nautical-themed idle MMORPG

name: Peril
summary: In Peril you play as Robyn, the Daughter of one of the Ranger's who were first sent in through the Slip-gates.

name: Pet Clinic Simulator
summary: Welcome to Pet Clinic Simulator, where your love for animals meets your management skills! Build and run your very own veterinary clinic in this charming, customizable arcade idle game.

name: Peaks of Yore: The Great Alps
summary: Take the Alpine Express and travel to the picturesque Einvald Valley to conquer the Great Alps' collection of crags, boulders, mountains, and more.

name: Petit Royaume
summary: A relaxing, free-building game set in a pixelated 3D environment.

name: Persona 5 Pocket Edition
summary: A demake of Persona 5 for the Game Boy.

name: Perino Candy Buster
summary: Dive into the vibrant world of Perino Ball Buster, an action-packed arcade game that combines classic Block Breaker gameplay with a delightful twist! Join Porino and friends on a whimsical adventure filled with colorful graphics, engaging stories, and competitive local multiplayer.

name: Pet Society Island
summary: A Virtual Game Pet Game! Decorate your home, dress your pet, play minigames, decorate your own island! Go fishing, digging and much more!

name: Pencak Silat 1.2
summary: Pencak Silat is the original martial art style of Indonesian. The tournament is open with the greatest Pencak Silat warriors all over the world.

name: Pencak Silat 2.1
summary: Pencak Silat is the original martial art style of Indonesian. At the dawn of 20th century, chaos and dispute reign across the Archipelago. A person with principle to unite calls for a new adventure in this tropical land.

name: Pebbles Quest
summary: The Princess has been kidnapped by evildoers! It is now Pebbles Quest to breach the Castle, face a gauntlet of traps and trials, all to rescue his one true love.

name: Penguin Hotel
summary: Game in a series of horror, action, story, and mystery-solving elements set in the Penguin Hotel, celebrating its 18th anniversary.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in starlight - Dance! (OP ver.)
Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Groovy
summary: Additional playable track 'GROOVY'.

name: Persona 5 Dancing in Starlight: Picaresque Mouse Set
summary: A set of 9 'Picaresque Mouse' accessories for all characters.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Tanaka's Amazing Commodities (Atlus Kozuka Remix)
summary: Additional playable track 'Tanaka's Amazing Commodities (ATLUS Kozuka Remix)'.

name: Persona 5: Dancing In Starlight - Wake Up, Get Up, Get Out There (OP ver.)
summary: Additional playable track 'Wake Up, Get Up, Get Out There (OP ver.)'.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Race Queen Set
summary: Race Queen costume set for Ann, Makoto, Haru and Futaba.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Trish Costume V1
summary: Costume 'Trish Costume v1' for Morgana.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Trish Costume V2
summary: Costume 'Trish Costume v2' for Morgana.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Sonic Suit
summary: Costume 'Sonic Suit' for Morgana.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Protagonist's Life in the Attic Set
summary: Costumes 'Casual Training Outfit' and 'Loungewear' for P5 Protagonist.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Heeho's School Uniform
summary: Costume 'Heeho Costume' for Morgana.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Gouto-Douji Costume
summary: Costume 'Gouto Costume' for Morgana.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Featherman Set
summary: The “Persona5 Royal Persona5: Dancing in Starlight Featherman Costume & BGM Set' contains cosmetic items for featherman from the rhythm game.

name: Penumbris Doña
summary: A pixelated, possibly horror, occasionally live-action point-and-click graphic adventure about visiting your ex

name: Pet'n'Run
summary: Pet’n’Run is a Mixed Reality game where you take control of your favorite animals and pet them through levels full of crazy obstacles and challenges.

name: Permuter
summary: Permuter is a synthwave-style autobattler inspired by Geometry Wars 3's Pacifism mode. Control an agile ship, weave through enemies, buy and stack game-changing upgrades, choose your build carefully to gain synergy bonuses, and defeat the challenging elite bosses.

name: Penguin Escape
summary: Penguin Escape is a fun and challenging game to play, simply collect all the items in order to move to the next phase, just do not get caught, use portals and platforms for your advantage

name: Pew Pew Gaem 3
summary: You owe the mafias some money... Fight trough the deadly waves of enemies and stay alive while trying to get to the person behind all this chaos.

name: Peek-A-Mimic Christmas Castle
summary: The mimics are on the loose - and this time, it's Christmas! Explore the castle and solve its puzzles to reveal and capture all of the hidden mimics.

name: Pent's Zacky, Zany Road Trip to Adulthood
summary:
Since the dawn of Pentagon, the five-sides ones achieve full adulthood by driving the famed 'Most Dangerous Road in the World'. Today, destiny calls out to our bored protagonist Pent to fullfill this Herculean task.

Explore a big world of unyielding nonsense that simply refuses to take itself seriously at any point. Earn money by completing wild races, taking pictures of strange phenomena (and appease the Government) or by just finding it on the ground in some ditch. There are also some puzzles, I suppose.

name: Perennial Dusk: Kinsenka
summary:
Industry veteran Yukito Urushibara and prolific illustrator Saine join forces for the first time to craft a stunning tale about a group of young people in an eerie world of endless twilight. Follow their story as they struggle against limitless cruelty and confront the inescapable traumas of life and death together.

Perennial Dusk: Kinsenka is the latest visual novel written by Yukito Urushibara, whose work on Irotoridori no Sekai and Sakura Moyu captivated players with stories that inspire hope as readily as they induce despair.

name: Persona 3 Reload: FeMC Mod
summary: A mod that aims to bring the female protagonist from Persona 3 Portable into the new remake. Step into an alternative timeline, now coming in pink! Features original tracks and remixes.

name: Penguin Origins
summary: Penguin Origins strives to deliver an experience reminiscent of the original game, based on when it started nearly 20 years ago. Enjoy the original looks and feels of how it started, with some remixed elements!

name: Persona 5: Funkin' in Starlight
summary:
The Phantom Thieves have gotten another anonymous request on the Phan-Site, this time, a worried father asking that his daughter's boyfriend's heart be taken, due to his twisted desires. Doesn't seem like much trouble, so Joker takes on this request solo! Little did he expect, someone familiar to us was waiting for him...

Waiting on the shadows, the other wildcards await for a challenge in the velvet room.. The VS. Joker Full Week is here!

name: Peter Pan: A Story Painting Adventure
People Jumping Tower
summary: "People Jumping Tower" is a casual-indie game that tests the player's athletic abilities and challenges them to beat their own records.

name: Perplex
summary: A neon-themed 2D puzzle platformer where you navigate intricate levels, solve physics-based challenges, and avoid obstacles to reach the portal. Play solo or with a friend in a visually stunning retro-futuristic world that tests your precision and strategic thinking.

name: Penguin Flight
summary: Soar Beyond Your Dreams

name: Persona 3 Reload: FemC Reloaded Project
summary: The FemC Reloaded Project serves as a major overhaul for Persona 3 Reload, restoring the female protagonist from Persona 3 Portable, with a reimagining of her route-exclusive soundtrack, different costumes, changes to UI and more.

name: Perdition's Gate Resurgence
summary: Perditions Gate Resurgence is a vanilla compatible megawad that serves as an unofficial community sequel to Perdition's Gate. The story takes place immediately after Perdition's Gate map 30, where the player had just set off the bomb meant to destroy the Earth in the bomb facility of Hell.

name: Perfect Ninja Painter 3
summary: New part of the puzzle platformer about ninja painters with new character, new features and new puzzles.

name: Petal Crash 2
summary: The freshest in arcade puzzle action blossoms again! Crash blocks together into dazzling chain reactions in a puzzle like no other - now completely refreshed with refined gameplay, arcade graphics, brand new game modes, and dazzling special attacks!

name: Pexit 8
summary:
A piece of Exit 8-like where all the anomalies are related to the penguins.A piece of Exit 8-like where all the anomalies are related to the penguins.

Horror game Penguin Hotel extravaganza

name: Perfected Doom 3
summary:
A gameplay-altering mod that changes the slow pacing of the base game, to a more fast-paced action-horror shooter. The mod attempts to completely overhaul the entire game with new monsters, rebalanced weapons, rebalanced monster stats, better graphics, new gameplay features, and much more.

There are 2 versions of the mod:
Vanilla Doom 3 & Doom 3: RoE.

name: Pets
summary: PETS is a platformer puzzle game. You will cross different dimensions and go through the maze, find your dogge.

name: Perfect Ninja Bundle
summary: Save 20% with the bundle of four games: "Super Ninja Miner" and three part of "Perfect Ninja Painter"

name: Pepper Buster
summary:
A classic reinvented… with a spicy twist!

Dive into Pepper Buster, a fiery reinterpretation of the legendary Pac-Man. Navigate haunted mazes, gobble up all the pac-dots, and avoid the relentless ghosts. But beware! Everything can change with explosive bonuses and penalties that add a thrilling twist to every game!

name: Perfect Tense: Maggot Therapy
summary: Perfect Tense: Maggot therapy is a horror-BL visual novel with themes of Zoroastrianism, decay, rebirth and insects. It follows two young men, Perfect Tense and Deadboy, who seek to resurrect Deadboy's brother through a twisted ritual.

name: PedalVerse
summary: PedalVerse combines the thrill of downhill MTB racing with the freedom of FPV drone exploration. Customize your rider and bike, race dynamic tracks, and set records to climb the leaderboard. Tackle challenges and explore a semi-open world. Ready to take on the challenge?

name: Penlight
summary: With the end of his high school career approaching, Kyou Koyama is a friendless and troubled young man. However, having recently taken an interest in hypnosis, he supposes he can salvage his relationships with his classmates using the power of suggestion. With the help of a modified penlight of his own design, he sets out the change his world, one class rep at a time...

name: Perfect World: Ascend
summary:
Join players worldwide on the same server. Switch between landscape and portrait modes at will. The latest masterpiece from the 20-year classic IP “Perfect World” is now officially released globally!

[ Perfect World: Ascend ] offers a truly open 3D world with high freedom and diverse gameplay.
Choose from a variety of cool professions and engage in exciting cross-server battles.
The innovative rotatable screen design allows you to switch between landscape and portrait modes at will.
publishers: Perfect World Games Singapore Pte Ltd

name: Petrichor
summary: Coming out to your partner can be scary.

name: Penguin Hotel 2: Snake Penguin Ambition
summary: The Snake Penguin is after you. Solve mysteries with a mysterious camera and push forward.

name: Pega Game
summary: become pega dog and explore heaven!

name: Pet & Dog Simulator
summary: Feed and grow your pet

name: Peachy Derby: Natsuki - Back to School
Peachy Derby: Minami - Back to School
Permission to Dock
summary: You’re on a mission to meet, greet, and mate a wondrous array of exotic and extraordinary lifeforms from across the galaxy. Aliens, machine intelligences, extradimensional entities, and even stranger things are out there – and they’re as curious about humanity as you are about them.

name: Perpession
summary: Gather resources, make strategic decisions, and rebuild a shattered world while battling nature and enemies alike. Test your crafting skills—can you emerge victorious through challenging combat and resource management?

name: Pestilence
summary: Players can expect to enter a 90's narrative-based psychological horror, where they get to experience a series of grim, dark, and very immersive environments while solving puzzles and unravelling the horror within.

name: Penguin Festival
summary: You are a penguin! Lend a helping flipper to your community as it prepares for an annual festival. Complete some last-minute festival to-dos during the day while you explore the vibrant penguin town. When night falls, join everyone and enjoy the festivities with games and music!

name: Pets and Friends
summary: Create your cozy unique animal album with your creations.

name: Pec-Men
summary:
PEC-Men is a free 3D action game with unique and humorous ideas. Players control the macho character “Brother Kenta ” and aim for the goal by climbing over obstacles by twitching the left and right pectoralis major muscles.
It features a simple yet stylish game design, and the unique experience of moving the pectoral muscles with just a left or right mouse click is addictive.
With an estimated play time of around 60 minutes, this game is perfect for casual players or play-by-play videos. "PEC-MEN" is a novel concept of manipulating the pectoral muscles and a somewhat surreal world view that is worth a try if you like free games!

name: Petrifica
summary: On the day they were supposed to vow eternal bonds, the two were cursed with what is said to be the world's most cruel curse. Dodging treacherous traps, they venture deep into the forest. All to laugh together once more.

name: Personal Murder Theater: Strangled Roots
summary: Immerse yourself in this grotesque visual novel. Unspeakable secrets, sinister crimes, and a macabre obsession weave this tale, where sanity crumbles beneath the tide of perversion and human cruelty. The first chapter in a new independent anthology of visual novels.

name: Peekaboo
summary: A terrifying first-person escape, where every step could be your last. Find your way out of a dilapidated, crooked house by discovering the secret passageways of the house. While outrunning a sightless, twisted puppet from hell, which will hunt down every noise it hears!

name: Petrichor
summary: Petrichor is a first person horror game inspired by Outer Wilds. Other older games inspired us for the graphics. You are in a cabin in the woods, some strange things are happening here.

name: Pearlessential
summary: Explore, prepare, and battle your way to a passing grade in this rather peculiar turn-based RPG. Engage the unfamiliar without levels or experience points. Instead, find skills, collect gear, and equip your party to assemble a perfect strategy.

name: Pecking Order
summary: Pecking Order is a fast-paced, absurd party game where sneaky worms must outwit hungry birds to survive. Juke, dodge, and strategise in a frantic battle of wits and reflexes. Work solo or in teams to complete objectives and escape before time runs out!

name: Pennylooter
summary: Pennylooter is a roguelike that takes place in an infinite world, where you'll have to fight increasingly numerous enemies as you explore your surroundings and collect pennies so that you can buy more items and survive the next wave.

name: Peek
summary:
Peek is an atmospheric, sound-driven deduction horror game that relies heavily on spatial audio to uncover clues. In this ritual-based survival experience, a restless presence stalks the room in tense rounds, leaving audio clues in all directions around you. Close your eyes, listen carefully, and track the direction, distance, and nature of each sound to piece together the ritual and end her pain.

You are Father Herman Goldie, summoned by the Ranford family to cleanse their den of its former occupant, the late Edna Maney, whose body was found under mysterious circumstances in the attic weeks ago. Though her remains have been removed, something else still lingers.

Your predecessor, Father Marron, attempted the rite but fled within minutes, his face slashed, his sight lost forever. Now, it falls to you to finish what he could not...

You kneel in the center of a 5x5 grid of blessed salts, tasked with cleansing the space of a hostile spirit. As it prowls nearby, subtle variations in footsteps, movement, and silence itself become your only tools. Identify what you heard. Retrieve the correct relics. Place them carefully. But be warned: mistakes won’t go unnoticed.

And most importantly...

DON'T PEEK!

name: Peacebringer
summary: Peacebringer takes the addictive auto-attacking gameplay of Vampire Survivors to the next level by introducing a party system. Build and control a team of heroes, each with their own unique abilities and attack patterns, as they battle against endless waves of corrupted beings.

name: Pelican Post
summary:
Pelican Post is a cozy narrative game about delivering mail to a town of unique characters and helping to regain a lost sense of community.

You play as Pepper, a young pelican who recently moved to Port Pleasant to take a job as the town's mailman. Through your job, you'll get to interact with and get to know the townsfolk and help them out.

"Small acts of kindness" is pretty much in the job description.

name: Peggle 2: Jimmy Lightning Master Pack
summary: It’s time to get ready for lightning in Peggle 2 . . . Jimmy Lightning! Everybody’s favorite Peggle gopher (from the original Peggle) is back and ready to crush Peggle boards with his unbelievable Multiball power, updated and awesomized for the discriminating Peggle 2 player! The exciting new Jimmy Lightning Master Pack features 10 all-new levels, 10 all-new trials, 30 all-new objectives and 3 achievements that are – yes! – all new. Ride the lightning and join Jimmy for some frantically fabulous Peggle 2 action today!

name: Percipio
summary: Percipio is a colorful, joyful, and beautiful puzzle platformer. 12 creative levels pose increasingly complex puzzles as you navigate a gorgeous floating world.

name: Pets Live
summary: Explore the world to discover new pets of all shapes and sizes, from the ferociously fierce to the cute and huggable. Then raise them until you are strong enough to compete against other trainers in Pets LIVE!

name: Pet Hero vs. Zombie
summary:
The zombie apocalypse is here! Choose your animal warrior - a brave cat with a gun, a mighty crocodile with a bazooka or a bold chicken with a revolver! More heroes are waiting to be unlocked.

Face endless hordes of zombies, fight for survival and collect gold coins to upgrade your weapons and unlock new characters and maps. Each battle is a test of skill and endurance - how long can you survive?

name: People and Zombies
summary: After the end of life, no survivors have been found, and we should continue to live.

name: Periodicity: Hats and Scars
summary: Survive against hordes of monsters. Equip different weapons with unique abilities. Forage for materials to rebuild a destroyed town. Upgrade your gear for maximum damage.

name: Pepez: The game
summary: PEPEZ: Meme Warfare - Dive into the ultimate meme shooter! Battle iconic memes and crypto giants. Ally with legends like John Wick for epic rewards. Are you ready to rule the meme-verse?

name: Penelope Syndrome
summary: You are not a hero. You are just an everyday average mechanic. You can fight, but without having the resources to repair damaged systems, you will die trapped with them.

name: Peepers Paradise
summary: Jump into the world of Peepers Paradise! A hentai game made by peepers for peepers! Peepers Paradise is a place where the models crave attention and sometimes more. Come find out what all that attention will get you.

name: Perrengue de escritor
summary: Short typing game released in for Game JAAJ 4 for the "Your Enemy are your weapons" section".

name: Penguin Flight: Beyond The Clouds
summary: In Penguin Flight: Beyond the Clouds, join the determined penguin on his quest to defy gravity! This 2D pixel art platformer offers challenging levels, creative obstacles, and high-flying action.

name: Perfect Flow
summary: A fast-paced platformer where you control the timing of obstacles. Help Hungry Guy navigate a world filled with various hazards to reach and devour the best kebab in the world.

name: Perfect Pitch
summary:
A game about music, romance, and the covid-19 pandemic as a convenient plot device.

Perfect Pitch is set in the American Midwest in late summer 2020. Just before the crescendo of covid cases later that year which would mark one of the deadliest winters on record.

You are an up-and-coming multi-instrumentalist (named Miles by default) who is presented with a rather unique opportunity: a full-ride scholarship to the internationally renowned, all-girls music conservatory named Géante Endormie.

But this scholarship is no simple charity... you have a job to do. The future of your classmates, and the future of the Conservatoire, depends on it.

Enjoy your stay at Géante Endormie~

name: Pepi Doctor
summary:
Need help to calm your kids before seeing a doctor? Try talking to a child, while playing! Pepi Doctor is updated and ready to meet new patients!

Is your kid afraid of the doctors? What about dentists? Get some help from a child-friendly PEPI DOCTOR!

Enjoy this cheerful pretend play game where a child plays a Doctor and treats three little patients: Amber, Eva and Milo.

It’s easy and fun to be a Doctor in this game: kids will explore a variety of doctors’ tools and get to cure five different conditions at their own pace.

name: PengPong
summary: PengPong is a survival roguelike shooter in a vintage cartoon world. Use a hockey stick to deflect pucks and weapons, stop swarms, and test your luck. Spend chips for safe upgrades or risk it at the roulette. New builds and quirky synergies challenge survival every run.

name: Pep A Pig
summary:
Get ready to meet Pep, the cutest little pig you'll ever find.

In this cozy and fun game, you arrive on a charming island where your only mission is simple: meet Pep, hang out with him, and enjoy tons of fun activities together.

No combat. No stress. Just you, a peaceful island, and Pep — your new best friend.

name: Peskit
summary: A unique roguelike deckbuilder: grab sushi from the conveyor belt, build boxes, and trigger powerful combos with sauces and dominos.

name: Pekla
summary: Descend into Hell in this horde survival action RPG. Battle through nine relentless circles, slay endless legions, and forge powerful builds in a dark world inspired by Dante's Inferno. Brutal bosses and merciless hordes will break you again and again—only through torment will you endure.

name: Perfect Circle: Stand Alone
summary:
Millie thinks her mom must be dying.

A short collection of scenes following three mothers and their children as they grow up through the years.

name: Pentaloop
summary: “PENTALOOP” is, a GM-less Murder Mystery game for 4 players. Play with family, friends, and like-minded people, Play together with your family, friends, or other like-minded people.

name: Pegshot: Vendetta
summary: Pegshot: Vendetta blends peggle, roguelike, and turn-based combat in a thrilling underworld of crime. Acquire powerful bullets and unique gear with distinct abilities that can alter the game’s physics. Ready for a journey of revenge against formidable gangsters!

name: Pereelous
summary: Spin your way to victory in this slotmachine-driven dungeon crawler. Battle monsters, collect loot and unleash the power of the random reels!

name: People of Mine
summary: A psychological horror where you play as a former agent hunting a cult—only to uncover a disturbing truth about your identity, memories, and the monsters you thought you were fighting.

name: Pebble Knights
summary: Oh no! The Evil Hell Fungus army attacks the Pebble Kingdom every night! Tiny but mighty, the Pebbles must defend it! Gather shiny things by day, power up, and gain traits to become even stronger Pebbles for battle! When night falls, team up to fight off the evil Fungus and protect your kingdom!

name: Perished Truth
summary: Inspired by classic "Resident Evil" and "Saw", prepare for an adrenaline-fueled survival horror following the story of Shinji Ueda, a struggling father who finds himself the subject of a twisted series of life-or-death trials. Fend off ravenous zombies, solve puzzles, and escape the trials...alive.

name: Persona 4 Revival
summary: Persona 4 Revival intertwines an investigation into a string of murders with the journey of self-discovery and encounters with the occult, all within a critically acclaimed, classic RPG experience—reborn in a new form!

name: Periapsis: Eclipse
summary: Conquer the Settled Galaxy in Periapsis: Eclipse, a unique roguelite where gravity, heat and the physics of space are the keys to conquest. Master orbital mechanics, real-world inspired weapons and nuclear rockets to outmaneuver dozens of hostile ships and claim victory for the Exiled Empire.

name: Pepper Odyssey
summary: Pepper Odyssey is an RPG about surviving a shipwreck in an unruly outlandish island. Survive the lawless island: fight, trade and explore. Gather scrap to trade, improve your shelter and build yourself the means to escape; or meddle in the affairs of the island and realize a vision for its future.

name: Peach Tangle
summary: A boy and a girl, alone together in a mysterious forest. A short and sweet romance visual novel where you get to know the cute, always positive tomboy Mira! Fully animated sexual content, great music and a short, focused story, with award-winning visuals and animation!

name: Peddlers Between Pulsars
summary: A story based RPG where you play as a cargo ship owner that travels between planets with other peddlers.

name: Perimbó
summary:
Jaime was just playing in the forest when, attracted by a beautiful red bird, he ended up falling into a deep and mysterious cave. Now, he must find a way to escape and, at the same time, unravel the forgotten secrets of this ancient place. In an underground world full of dangers and lost stories, you embark on an exciting adventure, solving puzzles, exploring secret passages and helping spirits that need to be freed.

This cave was once home to a tribe that worshipped the god Guaracy, creator of light and protector of nature. They lived in harmony until foreigners invaded and destroyed the sacred tree that brought sunlight into the caves. The magical Ybá fruit, the last reminder of this ancient power, now shines in the depths, waiting to be collected. Use the power of the sacred necklace given by the bird to create blocks of light and climb impossible heights, revealing hidden paths and overcoming obstacles.

At every turn, you’ll uncover pieces of this ancient puzzle. Help them, solve complex challenges, and recover lost tools like Jaime’s hoe to clear a path through the corrupted roots that block your progress. Immerse yourself in a compelling narrative that weaves legend, mystery, and resilience as you uncover the truth about the tribe’s fate and fight to escape back to the surface.

With an immersive atmosphere, unique soundtrack, and creative exploration mechanics, this game promises an unforgettable adventure. Explore, solve, collect, and climb as you guide Jaime on his journey back home and help restore peace to the souls trapped in the depths. Are you ready to unravel the mysteries of the cave and free your people?

name: Peak
summary: Peak is an online co-op climbing game where the slightest mistake can spell your doom. As a group of lost nature scouts, your only hope of rescue from a mysterious island is to scale the mountain at its center. Do you have what it takes to reach the PEAK?

name: Persevere
summary: Persevere is a turn-based survival RPG set on a grim and mysterious island. Control your team, explore an open world and fight Affects in an innovative combat system. Will your characters survive or descend into madness?

name: Pera Coda
summary: Pera Coda is a narrative mystery adventure about a man trapped between life and death. To escape, he must face his past, confront buried traumas, and stand trial for the life he lived. Set in Istanbul, it blends psychological drama, branching dialogue, and puzzles in a journey of self-discovery.

name: Persephone Lives
summary: Help the scientist manage the routine tasks of an indoor farm in a cold, lonely world. Together, you can keep the farm running and maybe do a little bit of good for humanity. A short and atmospheric visual novel.

name: Petmancer
summary: A whimsical roguelite dungeon crawler where you recruit magical pets, unlock ancient talents, and explore ever-changing pixel dungeons. Choose your hero, build your party, and battle the 7 Archmages to master the art of Petmancy.

name: Peaches Interplanetary
summary: Peaches Interplanetary is a short relaxing game about growing peaches on a spaceship. Explore the ship, talk to trees, drink some tea or coffee, and help Margot prepare for her first day spreading the power of peaches throughout the stars.

name: Peter's Apostles
summary: Peter's Apostles is a strategy game of the Tower Defense genre set in a Cyberpunk world where you place a large arsenal of Towers, or here called Arms, capable of stopping and destroying the Malwares and Malicious programs and messages that threaten the security of the server you protect.

name: Penguin Rocketeer
summary: Penguin Rocketeer is a fun, frantic flying game in which you help the penguin reach the moon, bouncing on clouds to propel you into the skies, and collecting as many coins, diamonds and other collectables as you can along the way!

name: Pettson's Inventions 4
summary:
In the fourth game about Pettson’s Inventions we will explore the workshop together with Findus! Pettson is inside trying to figure out how to make his machine work. He has tried everything but he can’t make it to work.
Of course, Findus wants to try and help Pettson with his machine, but to be able to do that he needs your help!
Try to find muckles that have hidden all around the workshop, and solve the invention the muckle needs help with, to slowly but surely get closer to a solution for the machine.

name: Perish Parade
summary: Long ago, the March of Ending was foretold by a prophet: a slow, creeping curse that would walk the world to its grave. Now, that march has begun, led by “The Icon”, a Godlike being who is unmaking the world one step at a time. With the world at the brink of destruction, you are its final hope.

name: Penguin Chat 2
summary: A 2003 project made by Lance Priebe, in which penguins could walk around and interact with eachother aswell as various locations.

name: Pengicitis The Game
summary: Pengicitis The Game is the officially licensed game about a day in the life of world famous influencer Pengicitis and his journey throughout the meaning of life.

name: Pet Show
summary: Draw a line to enclose the area and uncover the image underneath. Watch out for enemies who can catch you or cut your line!

name: Peek a Fish!
summary:
Where’s That Fish Hiding?
A Cute and Easy Brain-Training Picture Hunt Game

name: Penny the Pumpkin: Director's Cut
summary: Penny the Pumpkin: Directors Cut takes you on a delightful platforming open-world metroidvania with light puzzles to solve. Guide Penny, our lovable pumpkin, as she collects 18 precious coins! Your progress is saved every time she grabs a coin or enters a new area.

name: Penguin Colony
summary: Narrative adventure game based on H.P Lovecraft's At the Mountains of Madness. Swim, Slide and Explore open ended levels as multiple penguin types with different abilities and challenges.

name: Peggle Blast HD
summary: Enjoy peg-popping, rainbow-exploding fun. Discover all the Peggle Masters across 200+ levels while earning high scores that are beyond comprehension.

name: Perfect Victim
summary: Unravel the web of relationships between four girls trapped in a room deep underground, with one DOOR and no way out. Constructed for the Toxic Yuri VN Jam.

name: Penny for Your Potion
summary: Welcome to Penny for Your Potion! Customize your shop, manage your garden and brew potions for your customers to discover new ingredients, recipes and secrets in this medieval management game. Build the store of your dreams, grow your reputation and become the greatest alchemist in history!

name: Petri Dish
summary:
Petri Dish is an online browser game. No downloading or registration. Click and play. Instant immersion. This is the main principle of this game and what made it so popular - the greatest simplicity.

In the game, you are born on the map, gain weight and try to get to the top, like hundreds of other players. Gain weight, devour other players, be the strongest and the biggest. This is not just TOP-1, this is real domination!

name: Periodic Table: Game
summary:
"Periodic Table - Game" is designed for schoolchildren, students, chemists with experience and for people who want to learn even more about our world. We have collected a huge amount of information about the chemical elements, which is easy to remember thanks to the game form of learning. It's simple, you just need to play regularly, gain more "Atoms" and unlock new games and levels of difficulty!
Our game will also be useful for preparing for tests, quizzes and even important exams! Just play the game in between studying the basic material.

name: Pet City 2
summary: Adopt a loving virtual pet or your virtual little buddy or companion and decorate beautiful rooms

name: Pet Buddies
summary: A dress-up and decorating game where you take care of your virtual pet

name: Perfect Diamond
summary: Perfect Diamond is a fast-paced puzzle game made for the NES. ROM included! Slide puzzle blocks into the grid to fill lines. Try to survive as the pieces move faster and faster. 3 single-player modes, local multiplayer battle, battle vs CPU.

name: Perlin Festival
summary: Perlin Festival is an experimental fever-dream inspired by many of the surreal classics, with an emphasis on random events and interactions with the denizens within The Noise. You'll join the newest denizen, Pluto, uncovering only what you need to.

name: Persona 3 FES Append-han
summary: Persona 3 FES Append-han is an update disc for the original Japanese Persona 3 release. It required a Persona 3 disc to validate, after this the game could be played with all additional content from the FES Expansion.

name: Perash
summary:
"PERASH" is a PUZZLE game that uses a panel that moves while rotating.

If you move the panel while rotating it and connect all the same colors, it will be clear.

Transparent panels that do not need to connect colors, fixed panels that cannot be moved, conveyor that slides sideways when the panel is placed on top will appear.

name: Pentavolt
summary: Battle waves of geometric enemies in this incremental strategy game. Unlock powerful upgrades, build custom skill trees, and adapt your tactics to survive. Shape your path to victory in a world of evolving challenges and endless progression. A decent game to scratch the adhd itch

name: Peregrino
summary: Peregrino is a dark isometric survival adventure where you explore a cursed forest by day and manage your caravan by night. Gather resources, hunt deadly creatures, upgrade your caravan, care for your companions, and lead them through the vast wilderness in search of New Eden.

name: Pekku
summary: Start your climb in Pekku! Discover colorful islands packed with challenges, collectibles, creatures and much more. Get climbing in an all-new multiplayer Foddian adventure. PEKKU TIME!

name: Peaked Climbing
summary: Because the top won’t climb itself.

name: Peak
summary: hit bag..crank lever..upgrade moves..Hit Bag...Crank Lever...Upgrade Moves...HIT BAG....CRANK LEVER....UPGRADE MOVES....THIS... IS...PEAK... GAMEPLAY !

name: Petsitting
summary: Your friend is gone for the weekend and has left you in charge of their beloved family pet, the giant worm named Dog.

name: Penguin's Love
summary: Penguin's Love is a charming puzzle platformer that combines heartwarming storytelling with engaging gameplay. Players solve puzzles, overcome obstacles, and traverse varied levels to help the penguin reach his beloved. With cute visuals, creative mechanics, and a relaxing yet challenging experience, the game is perfect for casual players and puzzle enthusiasts alike.

name: Perception: Heart and Mind
summary: Perception: Heart and Mind is an action-adventure game that emphasizes precision platforming, mental and physical combat, and decision-making driven by either your heart or mind. Navigate a dangerous, interconnected world and confront the unpredictable behavior of Rootbranch's residents.

summary: Additional playable track 'Our Moment'. This item is compatible with both Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight and Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight on PS4.

name: Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight - Picaresque Mouse Set
summary: A set of 9 'Picaresque Mouse' accessories for all characters. This item is compatible with both Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight and Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight on PS4.

name: Peer Review
summary: Peer Review is a reboot of Half-Life's third and final expansion, Half-Life: Decay. Return to the Black Mesa Research Facility and relive the chaos from the perspectives of Dr. Cross and Dr. Green. With all missions from the original game and fully functional co-op, Peer Review aims to give a fresh take on classic Half-Life that you can enjoy with a friend.

name: Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight - Special Head Accessories Set
summary: Accessories 'Gentleman Thief Mask' and 'Crown of the Avatar' for all characters. This item is compatible with both Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight and Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight on PS4.

name: Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight - Special Wing Accessories Set
summary: Accessories 'Angel Wings', 'Demon Wings' and 'Underworld Coffins' for all characters. This item is compatible with both Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight and Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight on PS4.

summary: Additional playable track 'Tanaka's Amazing Commodities (ATLUS Kozuka Remix)'. This item is compatible with both Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight and Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight on PS4.

summary: Virtua Fighter costume set for P3 Protagonist, Yukari, Junpei, Mitsuru, Akihiko, Fuuka, Aigis and Ken.

name: Perfect Hegemony
summary: Explore a broken game 999999999999999 years after it was created.

name: Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight - WEGO Collab Set
summary: WEGO Collab costume set for P3 Protagonist, Yukari and Junpei.

name: Persona Dancing: Persona Cinematic Selection
summary: This season pass entitles you to a special selection of add-on tracks for Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight & Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight. Includes Let's Go! Phoenix Ranger Featherman, More Than One Heart, Fate is In Our Hands, Dream of Butterfly (OP ver.), The Snow Queen (ATLUS Tsuchiya Remix), unbreakable tie (OP ver.), Opening (OP ver.), Burn My Dread (OP ver.), P3 fes (OP ver.), Soul Phrase (OP ver.), Pursuing My True Self (OP ver.), and MAZE OF LIFE (OP ver.).

summary: This season pass entitles you to the additional cosmetic costumes (cosmetic accessories) for Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Yakuza Set
summary: Yakuza costume set for P5 Protagonist, Ryuji, Ann, Yusuke, Makoto, Haru and Futaba.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Original Crossdressing Set
summary: Original Crossdressing costume set for P5 Protagonist, Ryuji and Yusuke.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Catherine Set
summary: Catherine costume set for P5 Protagonist, Ryuji, Ann, Yusuke, Makoto, Haru, Futaba and Morgana.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Futaba's Shujin Academy Uniform & Loungewear Set
summary: Costumes 'Summer Shujin Outfit', 'Winter Shujin Outfit' and 'Shut-in Clothes' for Futaba.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Atlus Selection Set
summary: Atlus Selection costume set for P5 Protagonist, Ryuji, Ann, Yusuke, Makoto, Haru and Futaba.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Costume Season Pass
summary: This season pass entitles you to the additional cosmetic costumes for Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight.

name: Pepper Blast
summary: Experience explosive match-3 gameplay with 5 sizzling modes: Classic, Rock, Ice Block, Thief, and Fusion. Overcome unique challenges across 85 fiery levels. Ready to feel the burn? Chili Blast is waiting!

name: Perpetual Torment
summary: Perpetual Torment is the 27th entry in the Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping series, featuring 14 maps built in 6 hours or less using a custom texture set themed after the visuals of Doom 2016, with the D4V gameplay mod built-in.

name: Peter's House
summary:
Enter the dark and ominous world of Peter's House, where you play as Steve, a man hired to move boxes for the new owner. As you explore the house, you quickly realize that something isn't right.

Be aware of your surroundings.

name: Petracal
summary: PETRACAL is a first person dungeon-crawler survival set in the tunnels of a cave. Chart, plan, explore, devour, stay sane, and crawl your way to escape using everything you have at your hands reach to survive.

name: Peggy's Post
summary: As the new owner of a lighthouse-based post office, it's your role to sort mail, assign postage, and load parcels onto the correct delivery vehicle for shipping. Manage your earnings to upgrade your tools, purchase stamp packs, charter new ships, and above all else, pay off your loan in time -- or the lender *will* foreclose on your lighthouse.

name: Peak’s Edge
summary: Peak’s Edge is a pyramidal puzzle roguelike. Discover and equip a vast array of powerful armor abilities. Roll and re-orient yourself as you weave through enemies in your path. Explore the mysterious depths as you fall further and further into your peak’s edge.

name: Pencil Marks
summary: The sudoku puzzles you know and love — now on playdate!

name: Penguino
summary: In a world of cold decisions and sharp beaks, where every politician is a walking ideology, the fate of the nation is decided in a circle of the chosen. Welcome to Penguinocracy — a strategic political simulator where pressure isn't just a metaphor, it's a mechanic.

name: Peaceful Gardens 2: Cute Cats
summary: Escape to a World of Tranquility with "Peaceful Gardens 2: Cute Cats"!

name: Peestal 6: With Cheese
summary: The POSTAL Dude embarks on an epic journey to receive a piece of goat cheese.

name: Pets and Friends Butterflies Bundle
summary:
Create your dream sticker album with an extra set of butterflies themed stickers.
Discover the amazing world of animals, flowers and cozy objects with which to create an amazing sticker album. Plus, you'll learn interesting facts about animals, put together puzzles and exercise your brain with the Memory game. The set additionally includes a pack of new butterflies themed stickers to add variety to your album.

name: Pets and Friends: Butterflies Pack
summary: A set of butterflies-themed stickers to embellish a sticker album.

name: Perfume Atelier
summary: Blend fragrances in your cozy perfume atelier! Craft unique scents by mixing essences, design beautiful bottles, and try to sell your creations to curious customers. Decorate your workshop, unlock new recipes, and grow your reputation in the art of fragrance.

name: Penny For Your Thoughts
summary: Inspiring hope with an outstretched hand.

name: Penance
summary: Searching for his missing wife, Calen awakens in a place that feels both familiar and wrong. As night falls, terrifying creatures emerge. Hide, fight strategically, and solve puzzles to survive the shifting nightmare and uncover the truth.

name: Pedros Eggventure
summary: we are doing this game for a project at "univercity". we hope you enjoy this game that we made. we have everything you would want, a main character who totally does not look like Pedro Pascal, a dragon, a run for your life and just some good old egg puns. - Ms Maddy of Breakfast Crew

name: Peel a Banana
summary: Welcome to the simplest yet most oddly satisfying game you'll play today! All you have to do is click to peel a banana layer by layer. Once a banana is fully peeled, it counts as 1 banana. Then it's on to the next one—no breaks, no limits, just endless peeling action!

name: Pedigree Tactics
summary: Recruit monsters to battle in tactical, turn-based combat. Create the ultimate team through careful fusion to pass on powerful abilities and save this kooky hand-drawn world.

name: Pew-casso
summary: Choose your loadout, choose your art brushes, and blast your way to a masterpiece! Pew-casso is a top-down action-roguelite shooter where you defeat enemies to level up and create a piece of art. The longer you last, the more complex your unique piece of art will become.

name: Personal Best
summary: Personal Best is a Momentum Platformer. The player must navigate through the various paths that make up each level on their way to the Stopwatch at the end. However, they have a limited amount of time to progress, and when that timer runs out, their score (gained via collecting Charms throughout the level, as well as just making their way to the end) are tallied up and converted into EXP and Points. They're then sent to the Upgrade Menu where those points can be used to purchase upgrades, allowing the player to better navigate and further progress in the level.

name: People of Note
summary: In this turn-based RPG musical, join Cadence as she recruits an ensemble of musicians on her quest for stardom. Experience turn-based combat like never before, where each battle is a musical performance with evolving combat conditions and genre-bending mashup attacks!

name: Petit Planet
summary: Petit Planet is HoYoverse's brand-new cosmic life sim that's free-to-play and cross-platform. Here, you can build your home, live alongside fuzzy neighbors, and discover the infinite possibilities of life on this planet!

name: Petrick
summary: This is a FE-like game. To defend against human forces, you will assemble monster girls. Training them, get powerful equipments and skills... In short, it features a wealth of character development elements. Every decision players make will influence the outcome of the entire game!

name: Penance
summary: Immerse yourself in the unsettling atmosphere of Penance, a mystery adventure where every step in your search for the truth brings you closer to the abyss. Explore a gloomy monastery and unearth ancient secrets that will test the fragile duality between your guilt and your faith.

name: Perfect Shot
summary: You will step into the role of a professional photographer navigating the glamorous world of high-fashion models. As a photographer with a taste for more than just beauty, you use your camera to capture not only stunning images but also desire, pushing the boundaries between art and seduction. Each photoshoot becomes an opportunity to explore forbidden fantasies.

name: Pet.Net
summary: Hatch and raise your very own PET, evolve them, train their stats, compete in competitions AND MUCH MORE! Designed for either active or passive play, sitting in the corner of your screen while you work on other things.

name: Peganomics
summary: A roguelike pachinko about building outrageous synergies with pegs, balls, and buckets. Chase massive scores, discover chaotic combos, and break the economy of pegs in your quest for the ultimate run.

name: Peak Climb
summary: Climb higher, survive longer, reach the summit.

name: Perfore the Perforien Request
summary: Carolanne Marin, Princess of Prodo, is invited to Berlo, the capital of Birini and the great capital of Perfore, to see the Perforian in person for a request.

name: Pet Oddities: Desktop Shelter
summary: Here's a chill casual collection sim game! In another dimensional world, you'll use an old book to keep collecting all sorts of cute, weird, funny creatures in different styles. Your aim? Track down the oldest one and become the ultimate collection master! And yeah, this game will keep updating！

name: Perk Up
summary: Perk Up! is a multiplayer deck-building fighting game where every defeat makes you stronger. Each time you fall, you gain new powers, evolving into an unstoppable force. Keep fighting, adapt, and outlast everyone to become the last one standing!

name: Peropero Candy: You no Shou
summary: The protagonist is an average guy. One day in the street I meet up a agent who introduces me into a H shop (Image Club). I'm unwilling because it may be coarse, but he confidently says to me that there's a pretty girl in the shop, so I change my mind and get in. Yes! A beautiful and nice girl named Candy welcomes me. From now on the story's simple. We talk familiarly for a while and take a H situation-play. From time to time I meet up a girl in the street who resembles Candy in appearance but she says she doesn't know me. Who is she?

name: Pelican Empyrean
summary: Food is love! In this fantastical roguelike card game share the magic of abundance by cooking delicious meals for all who come to Pelican's kitchen.

name: Pencil Stories
summary: Explore Tsukinoma village after midnight and share the peace and solitude with Letty whilst everyone is asleep. Unravel secrets of lost letters in this unique, hand-drawn world - no rush, just calm discovery.

name: Pegasis Odyssey
summary: In the far reaches of space, an odyssey begins. Explore hostile biomes, face powerful enemies, and gather vital resources in a retro shoot ’em up. Reset to evolve and grow stronger. The odyssey of Pegasis is endless, how far will you go?

name: Peak The Adventure Begins
summary: Climb, explore, discover.

name: Perfect Liar
summary:
a modern juke-em-up / a speedrunner's purgatory / a bite-sized dose of cortisol

collect map tiles to chart your path through the liar's maze while simultaneously dodging your way through a web of increasingly menacing angelic foes; think on your feet and make your own luck from the draw to score record times, or plow ahead cautiously taking down each stage as it comes. collect powerups, study patterns of movement, die endlessly—and come back each time ready for more. test your wits with a unique 'dodging only' mechanic through a stark hand-drawn world, overcoming 18 grueling untruths to nerve-wracking electronic blast beats.

name: Pet Street Story
summary: Jinyu, also known as Xiaoli, worked on Pet Street to repay her owner's debt as a way of expressing gratitude for the owner's life-saving kindness. During this time, she made various friends and experienced unusual events. As she matured, Jinyu decided to revive the increasingly depressed Pet Street.

name: Pet Desktop Adventure
summary: Pet Desktop Adventure is a desktop tower defend game. Defeat waves of enemies, get mysterious eggs and collect different pet animals. While you do your own things, adding a little fun to your desktop!

name: Perilous Light
summary: Perilous Light is a Lovecraftian-style 2D puzzle-platformer. The game’s core mechanics revolve around a unique player-light interaction, challenging players to solve environmental puzzles while evading deadly light.

name: Peripheral
summary: A first-person psychological horror game where you must return seven books to their shelves in a deserted library while being hunted by statue-like entities that only move when unobserved. Survive using observation and strategy in this tense 20-30 minute experience.

name: Pete's World
summary: Pete the Penguin woke up and found himself in a mysterious and dangerous world. Help him navigate this challenging world by avoiding obstacles like shooting projectiles, spawning rain clouds and more while gaining points by collecting flowers.

name: Petal Pals
summary: Cozy idle creature-collector in a magical forest. Hatch eggs, raise and evolve monsters from common to rare. Manage a farm and hotel, add automation, and try gacha. Stay productive with transparent-window mode and a Pomodoro timer. Offline progress. Aesthetic and relaxing. Collect your monsters!

name: Periphery
summary: Periphery is a psychedelic action-horror game. Uncover the truth about your workspace, get introduced to the locals and their gnostic fascination. Warp into the pixelated world of Periphery and experience surreal world built on mystery.

name: Perfect Run
summary: Guide a nimble ball through bite-size courses filled with varied hazards and little puzzles. Instant restarts and tight controls make every attempt addictive. Learn the route, find the trick, and enjoy that “yes!” when it clicks.

name: Perennial
summary: Perennial is a fast paced platformer with layered difficulty. Survive the hazards, collect everything, find the hidden challenge and puzzle rooms, slide boost and speed run for coin combos, complete your hat collection, rescue a babe.

name: Peasant Dream: Ascension
summary: Forge your destiny and become a legend! Help villagers, explore a deadly dungeon, build passionate romances, and prove your worth to reach the rank of Gold Adventurer. Your journey to glory begins now!

name: People In The Dark
summary: People In The Dark is a short horror game that can immerse you in its atmosphere and give you a lot of emotions. The game is not based on real events!

name: Peach Territory
summary: This is an avg game with a fantasy story. It tells the story of Xiao Xuan who jumped off a cliff and entered the peach blossom realm, a place isolated from the world for thousands of years, and then fell in love with a girl, cultivated, and finally defeated the devil.

name: Perpetuo
summary: Perpetuo is a first-person psychological horror game where you explore a mysterious apartment trapped in an endless time loop. Solve challenging puzzles, uncover a haunting story, and survive as a lurking presence grows stronger with each cycle.

name: Peasants War
summary: Peasants War is the first competitive medieval shooter, created by one-person development studio New Companion.

name: Pencil! x Walkabout Mini Golf: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland - Lesson Pack
Petunia's Purgatory
summary: Petunia’s Purgatory is a creepy-cute, idle-farming game that lives at the bottom of your screen. Plant seeds that grow into horrifying crops, sacrifice animals for blood, and summon assistants to help you run your farm. Manage your sanity while you try to appease the Elder God!

name: Pesky Orcs!
summary: In "Pesky Orcs!" you take part in medieval fantasy battles between ancient foes: Orcs and humans. Dive into a unique mix of Autobattler, RTS and Roguelike in real retro pixelart fashion!

name: Pelikeeper
summary: Pelikeeper is a cozy tower defense & base building strategy game where you play as the last pelican in a world swallowed by a shadowy fog. Build up and defend the settlement around your lighthouse, rescue lost animal neighbors, and return constellations to the cosmos.

name: Peacemaker: Protect, Search & Destroy
summary: Peacemaker is a 3D Shooter where you are in control of a helicopter. Playing as a pilot who is tasked by the UN to take down Terrorists, you will engage in 21 action filled missions with multiple helicopters to chose from with objectives that range betwen base defense, escore and assault. You can choose to either use the "nose" camera or "chase" camera for your preference

name: Peppa Pig: Jump & Giggle
summary: Jump into a playdate with Peppa Pig and friends.

name: Peak or Die
summary: Peak or Die is a narrative-driven survival game about leading a team of adventurers up a deadly mountain, where every decision has lasting consequences. Manage oxygen, food, and team morale while facing moral dilemmas, random events, and an unforgiving environment. Reach the summit — or fail trying.

name: Pepper Rush
summary: Half duck. Half dog. Total chaos. Rosan got separated from Grandpa Spike in Pepper City and needs to get to the airport ASAP! Dodge insane traffic, eat peppers to turn into an unstoppable beast, and avoid sweets so you don't get too fat to run. It's crunch time in Pepper Rush!

name: Periscope Down
summary: Hunt enemy ships through your submarine's periscope using the Playdate crank.

name: Perciflette
summary: Welcome, future hero! Perciflette is a narrative adventure with a simple goal : Find the way out. Explore, move forward with caution, and make the right choices…or start over!

name: Perfect Hue Arena
summary: A casual action platformer with 7 game modes including Capture the Flag, Boss, Puck, and Orb. There are a variety of unique items to collect and atmospheric arenas to explore.

name: Penniless Chef
summary: "Penniless Chef" is a game where you run and grow your own restaurant. Run and grow your restaurant, and get to know the villagers!

name: Pearls of Wisdom
summary: A rogue-like mindfulness deck builder with real-world side quests. The game involves matching quotes, using power-ups ('emblems'), and undertaking mindfulness tasks to increase the score.

name: Pegged
summary: A pachinko roguelike. Step into a late-night Japanese bar, drop balls through cascading pegs, and pray at the shrine for one more lucky run. City-pop hums from the radio. The night is young.

name: Perfect Baseball: Excitement! Craze! The Stirring Game!
Pepper the Giant Purple Dog
summary: In this twist on a harmless pet simulator, take care of Pepper, who happens to be a giant purple dog. But when things go awry, you will have to decide: how many lives is one good boy worth?

name: Penguin Ascension
summary: A cozy pixel-art idle clicker where you click for Fish, buy upgrades, trigger random events, and Rebirth for Golden Krill to unlock permanent prestige boosts and absurd arctic progression.

name: Perceptum
summary: A psychological horror game where you play as a medium investigating the disappearance of a family. Explore a house with an oppressive atmosphere, close your eyes to hear the beyond, use your mirror to see what should not exist and uncover the truth hidden within its walls.

name: Petmagotchi
summary: Adopt a kitten or a puppy and follow your companion’s day-to-day life.
